review_text: Great place to stay for a weekend while visiting family in Beaver. Very cozy and clean. The host even left coffee pods, creamer and a couple of snacks! Loved it and will definitely try to stay again on our next trip.
Our favourite place to stay on our travels to see family in the south! Highly recommend.

Perfect stay for our one night stay passing through the area. Tracy pays attention to the details. We didn’t cook due to short stay but snacks, tea (and honey!!) , coffee and creamers available during our stay was appreciated. The bed was comfortable, the step in shower perfect for my husband w/ mobility challenges and the soaps smelled amazingly calming. We did not have neighbors during our stay in this duplex so unsure how that would have affected our stay. We saw bunnies out the kitchen window and loved the peacefulness we got to experience during our stay. Tracy was responsive and kind. We plan on passing through Beckley annually going forward and would stay here again.
Thanks for the overnight accommodations
Exactly as advertised
Great place to stay, quiet and peaceful. Tracy made it very easy
Great place :)
Nice

I don’t like leaving negative reviews, but immediately on check in I had a guy using a weed wacker to cut grass right next to my truck; luckily no damage. The apartment’s bedroom was ice cold during check in and the remote to control the AC unit didn’t work. I reached out asking if there was something special that needed to be done to use it, and I got little help; I ended up using the front room’s remote and freezing for the first night. The apartment’s walls are VERY thin, and you will hear everything next door. Finally, the WiFi doesn’t hardly reach into the bedroom, so my phone would go in and out of WiFi. I ended up just turning WiFi off of my phone because it was so irritating. All in all, not the best Airbnb I’ve stayed at.

This place was perfect for a short stop during my travels. The instructions for parking and check-in were very clear and easy to follow. The neighborhood was nice and felt safe. The place itself was the perfect size and was extremely clean with some lovely decor. Would definitely stay again!
Cozy and exactly what i need for a weekend stop.
I was here for a clinical rotation. It was the perfect location about 4 min from the hospital. A nice private and clean place. Tracy was very pleasant and always responsive.
Very clean.

Thank so much for letting us stay at your lovely apartment, Tracy! It was the perfect spot for a weekend ski trip and playing board games beside the fire. This has to be one of the cleanest and most comfortable Airbnbs I've ever stayed in. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Great place to stay for a couple. Electric fireplace was great to relax and dry ski clothes. Bed super comfy. Kitchen fully stocked. Easy 25 min drive from Winterplace. Better value than surrounding hotels! Tracy was very responsive. Would book again.

Very cozy, tastefully decorated…Everything was spotless.
I'd stay again.
Cute little cozy apartment! We stayed for the weekend snowboarding! super close to everything we needed!!
Tracy and her stylish space helped make my trip to Beckley a great experience!
Great place to stay and relax.

We were visiting the River Gorge National Forest. The apartment was easy to find with the instructions provided. It is not far from the Grandview. It was clean and tidy and most amenities were provided.

This is the second time we’ve stayed at this apartment (we stayed in unit A the first time) it’s a great location for what we needed it for as we were heading down to North Carolina. We would stay here again if we needed to do a half way stop while travelling.
OK
Stylish is an apt description!
The directions were very helpful and check-in was seamless. A good location and a close drive into Grandview!
Tracy was so sweet! Beautiful unit!
I have stayed Units A and B. Tracy does a outstanding job with her units. This unit is very relaxing after a day on the road or at work.
Tracy was a great host. She immediately responded to everyone question I had. Her place was clean, adorable and perfect for our time in the area.
Nice place very close to NRG. Place was exactly as listed, the only thing that bothered us was whenever the upstairs neighbors walked around you heard every step. Other than that it was great.

This little gem served our needs well. Beautiful inside as pictured. Sits in a normal residential area that is within 10 minutes of the bulk of Beckley shopping and dine in restaurants. Pricier than a hotel room but felt like a pampered getaway. Once inside, you forget where you are. Beautifully decorated. Tracy was very fast to respond to all questions we had.
Nice place, great owner! I would stay here again.

Lovely experience! The place was so clean, everything was well thought out. Did a great job on the interior design of the place, felt spacious, sleek color scheme, had everything you need. I’m a little directionally challenged but she gave great directions and pics to help find the place!

This unit was very clean, as others have noted the walls are thin so you can definitely hear surrounding tenants but it was definitely more than tolerable. Place is cute and definitely good for a night or two.

Very clean, comfy bed, great communication from host on how to find the home, it would be tricky if not. My only issue was being able to hear the neighbors, however they were not noisy, just thin walls/floors. Would stay here again.

It was very nice for what we needed, conveniently close to surrounding activities. Nicely sized kitchen and bedroom, with amenities. Driveway difficult to get in and out of. Neighbors above and next door were noticeably noisy.
Tracy had done a great job remodeling this little apartment. We had everything we needed and more! Comfortable bed, great kitchen, perfect bathroom! Simply a great place.
The place is a nice cozy little spot. Kitchen had all that we needed to cook for the weekend. Shower was a little cramped for me but no real complaints.
This place was great! Tracy excels at hospitality- there were so many little details that made us feel comfortable and welcome. We are so grateful for such a wonderful spot to stay on our trip!
This was my second time here, and itvwas just as clean and comfortable as the first time. I highly recommend this Air bnb if it's available.
I enjoyed my stay it was great! Thank you!

Tracy did an outstanding job of ensuring that the space felt personable and clean. We loved all of the small details that were included (shampoo, conditioner, lotion, snacks, coffee/tea, etc.). The bed was extremely comfortable and the A/C is awesome! We felt very taken care of and loved that the space was so stylish and clean.
We will be sure to stay here again if we are ever out in this area and will be recommending this place to those who venture out here.
Thank you Tracy for a wonderful stay!
Nice clean apartment, in a quiet neighborhood.

The property suited my needs for an overnight stay. It was clean and comfortable. The walls between the adjoining units were thin so activity/conversation could be overheard; fortunately the other guests were relatively quiet so it did not significantly disturb my stay.
This was the best little place! We were there to hike New River Gorge National Park, and it was a perfect distance from the park to other cute local towns. Very clean! :)
Finding Tracy's place was easy with here description and checking in was also easy. Her place has all you need for your stay.

Could not have been pleased with our room in this triplex development. Clean, up-to-date, generously stocked and very convenient to the family that we were visiting. I would recommend to anyone who is looking for something nice and private for stay in the area.

Very clean, quaint, and nice little up to date modern place! Just felt cozy and hip at the same time and very very clean and Pristine!! Not a place I would recommend taking children, just because I wouldn’t want them to mess anything up it’s so well put together. Overall tho very nice place for a couple to stay!!
So much nicer then the hotels we normally stay in!
The space was beautiful, clean, and very well thought out.
Tracy's house is located in a peaceful area. The interior was clean and as shown in the pictures. Tracy's friendly and responsive.

Perfect stay for a weekend getaway! This place was super easy to find, especially with Tracy’s well detailed instructions. Also, Tracy’s duplex made for a peaceful place to rest and relax after hiking. Would stay here again!

Enjoyed staying at Tracy’s place. It’s tucked in a quiet neighborhood. The duplex does share a wall and has an apartment a above so you can hear other guests if they are around but it didn’t bother us. Definitely good for two people, three might be a little tight. Exactly as described plus it’s a great location for getting to the New River Gorge state park either the northern section with the famous bridge or to the south to Grandview area.
We enjoyed our stay! Tracy’s place was clean and had all we needed for our stay while visiting New River Gorge.
This was a great place to stay. It was very clean, comfortable, and private. We would stay here again if we were ever in the area again. :)
The place was so clean and was close to the attractions offered in the area! Tracy was an awesome host!
Tracy’s house was spotless with beautiful deco & comfy!!!
Beautiful place, very clean and comfortable. Enjoyed our stay, thanks!

The apartment was super clean and so well laid out. My husband and I were there for only one night. We would definitely stay again.
Thank you.
Patty and Bob
Tracy’s apartment was perfect for our visit to New River Gorge NP!

Our stay was amazing!! The location is perfect for an adventure in Southern WV. The property was very well maintained and clean. The kitchen was beautiful and great for a couple who enjoys cooking together. The decor was beautiful, and the furniture was so comfortable that we actually had a hard time getting out of bed the morning after exploring the mountains. Fortunately, several options were provided for our coffee. Tracy was great and very responsive. We had such an amazing time and are planning to visit again soon. Thank you for a weekend that we will never forget!!!
Perfect little spot for a quiet getaway! We loved this AirBnB!
this is the bmnicest place I have stayed in so far. Absolutely beautiful.
Tracy was very helpful and communicative and super understanding! I definitely would recommend booking through her for anyone visiting the Beckley area! Felt right at home!
Great place to stay - apartment was really clean and had a great layout. Would happily stay again.

Served our needs well. Very comfortable bed. We didn’t need to contact Tracy but I feel certain she would have been responsive and helpful if we had needed her. Tracys instructions for finding the driveway were definitely helpful as gps would have left us guessing. That was never a problem due to the instructions she provided.

We (two adults) stayed at this listing briefly as an overnight stop while traveling. It was extremely clean and well kept. The bed was very comfortable! Tracy includes detailed directions to the listing so we had no issues finding it even in the dark. The house manual also includes detailed instructions/helpful info for your stay. We would definitely stay again.
Great place to stay! Very clean and cozy. Would stay again!

Tracy’s place was perfect for a few night stay in the area! The bed was extremely comfortable, kitchen has the basics, and was overall a great space! I would highly recommend for anyone looking for an Airbnb in the area!
Tracy was an amazing host. This Air Bnb was very accurate in it’s listing and a great value. The place was spotless and well stocked. I will be staying here again!

Tracy's was in the perfect location as it was super close to both hospitals that I needed to be at throughout my stay. She was able to accommodate my stay with very short notice. I appreciated all of the small touches she puts into her listing, I highly recommend her listing.

Tracy is an excellent host with very timely and effective communications and a very well maintained apartment. The place is super clean and all amenities are exactly as described. We are pleased to have rented the place and really enjoyed our stay.
Great host with an impeccable BnB!
Overall excellent. Only recommendation perhaps softer lighting in living room
Tracy was able to accommodate our last minute reservation and was quick to reply. Space was very cozy and the kitchen with coffee and creamer included was a nice perk.
Really nice enjoyed
Very convenient location for a stopover on our way to VA Beach. Lovely space and very clean. We enjoyed our stay!
Great place
Really well decorated and clean and comfortable Centrally located to downtown area where I was working.
Gorgeous and Roomey!

Like-new cleanliness, very private space, all the amenities you could possibly need to feel right at home.
We were briefly confused when checking in by the fact that the rental is in a building behind the street address home. But it became clear when we checked around the buildings. Good thing it was daylight!
Clean, Cozy, Perfect!!!

The place was beautiful! The bedroom and bathroom were my favorite because they were so clean and nice! The only thing I'd add to the room is more towels (there were only 2) and the a clean spinge for the dishes. Other than that the place was perfect and I'd stay again
We had a great stay here! It's a clean and cozy apartment 25 minutes from Winter Place. The host was very responsive and friendly. Had no issues at all.
Stay was great directions and entry was easy and clear.
Comfortable accommodations! Recommended place to stay if you’re flipping through the area

Great place to stay overall. The pics are very accurate and this is a really nice and cozy home. Small homey things are included to make our stay nicer which was great (olive oil, basic seasonings, pots and pans, shower gels, etc.) My only complaints would be the neighbors upstairs. They aren’t very loud, but you can hear them at times walking around and playing music. The shower is a bit small, but it’s as pictured and accurate! Comfy bed and the heaters work great.
It was very nice and cozy
Tracy was wonderful. She was kind, responsive and cared a lot about us being comfortable! She is a great host!
Tracy was kind and communicative. She put a lot of love into her home, and it shows! She thought of everything that you could need. Neighbors are friendly as well.
Very nice
My Inlaws very much enjoyed this place. I recommend it for the Beckley area. Will be reserving here again. Thank you for making it a home away from home.

This space is fantastic! beautifully decorated, squeaky clean, very comfortable, with all the basics and more in the bathroom and in the kitchen. And a very comfortable bed with beautiful white sheets and a white comforter. Tracy is definitely a SUPERhost. She is accessible, friendly and responsive! Whenever I need a place in West Virginia this is it!

Oh my gosh! Where do I start.
I will most definitely be back. They treat you like family. They built me a bonfire, offered me food. The kindest people i ever met
Its a beautiful place. You wont regret.
Such an amazing place to stay! Jill is great and answered all our questions. The property was beautiful. Definitely be back!
Cliff and Jill are awesome people they treat you just like family. They would give you the shirt off their back if you needed it. The property was beautiful. Highly recommend.
Peaceful and awesome location, can't wait to stay there again.
Oh so very beautiful! Quiet, restful and my husband got to fish, PTL😊. Everyone we needed. Wonderful, friendly hosts. Thank you 🙏
Great host! Super friendly! My family will definitely be staying there again!
Great spot
This is a great place. Especially if you like to fish! Jill and Cliff are super nice.

I would definitely go back and stay here again. Jill was a super friendly host and responded quickly to my questions. My son and I enjoyed exploring the mountains and farm. Jill also let my son catch frogs in their pond which he loved.
We are so glad we chose Jill’s cabin for our stay. Jill and her husband were friendly and we enjoyed fishing every evening. Such a great place to stay!

Our stay was more than perfect! Jill and Cliff were so hospitable. Made us feel like we were home ❤️. The cabin was super clean from top to bottom. They really have thought of everything a guest could need or want and had it already in the cabin. The property is beautiful and so calming. Cliff went out of his way to ensure the kids had a blast fishing. My family rented 3 BnBs in the area this weekend and Cliff n Jill’s place was THE BEST hands down!!!
Jill has a wonderful cottage that was perfect for our New River Gorge trip. She took the time to personally acquaint my daughter and me to the property and share local recommendations.
Jill’s place was perfect for my stay!

Mrs Jill’s cabin had to be the cleanest most comfortable AirBnB my family and I have been to. It’s very peaceful and homey. Mrs Jill made sure we had everything we needed and more! She is an exceptional host. Her cabin gave my family views and an experience that pictures couldn’t do any justice. We created so many memories in the few days that we were there. My kids are already asking to go back. We will definitely be booking with Mr Cliff and Mrs Jill again for sure!

Jill & Cliff are the most hospital hosts I’ve encountered. The cabin is nestled on their beautiful land just outside Beckley. My girls and I found it easy to navigate to see local attractions and make it back in the evenings. My youngest thoroughly enjoyed feeding their horses and fishing in the pond. The cabin itself is clean and was well equipped for my family of four. We thoroughly enjoyed our Thanksgiving break and look forward to returning soon.
Excellent place to stay. Private and quiet. Excellent host

We loved our stay at this beautiful cottage,it was immaculate. Very picturesque. The house was nice and warm. The heat worked great. The beds were comfy, the shower was warm and the pressure was great . There was a full size fridge. Plenty of TV channels . Highly recommend staying here!
Jill made us feel right at home. loved waking up to watch the deer.

Peaceful location, well maintained, and had plenty of amenities to provide the comforts of home.
We enjoyed the beauty of the property and seeing wildlife. Comfortable beds and a well stocked kitchen were a definite plus!
Morning coffee on the front porch was our favorite!
Perfect little house for a getaway. Clean and comfortable. Convenient location for what we needed. Will definitely be back!!
We had a wonderful time! The beds were super comfy. You can really unplug here. The scenery and wildlife were gorgeous! Can't wait to stay again!!!!
Awesome atmosphere. Clean place

I can not recommend this place enough! Jill and Cliff have an absolutely beautiful property. We visited WV to see the New River Gorge National Park but once we arrived at our cabin we didn’t want to leave.
Jill was very responsive when I messaged her and unbelievably friendly! She came over and introduced herself and chatted with my husband and I for a bit and gave us some background on the horses on the property and the fishing business her and Cliff run.
Our daughter LOVED Reba and Butters (the 2 horses) they were also friendly and so fun to watch!
We will absolutely be back to visit this property!
We enjoyed our evening at Jill’s place. She was such a great host! We hope to return and do some catfishing soon 😊
Great peaceful location

Jill and Cliff were very welcoming, friendly, and responsive. Beautiful cabin, and the property was absolutely gorgeous . My family and I felt all the stress just vanish while there. Thank you for allowing us to stay at your cabin and making beautiful lasting memories!
This is my second time staying here. it's such a great place, and Jill is so friendly! Can't wait to go back.
Jill and Cliffs place was incredible in every way. If you need peace and relaxation, dont look any further than this cabin. Thank you Jill and Cliff for an amazing weekend!

Great place to live with families for a relaxing vacation. Beautiful surroundings with fishing available for adults and kids. Close to the state parks and reasonable distance to all sites of New River Gorge National Park. Kids have fun fishing and watch. Overall, Every great cabin for vacation!
Amazing! This is our second stay and will be the only place we stay! Cannot ask for anything better: friendly hosts, beautiful property, a true slice of heaven!
The cabin is beautiful and peaceful. My family has been going there for four years now. Jill is a wonderful host and very friendly.
This cabin was beautiful!! It was everything we expected and the hosts were extremely helpful and nice. There was a lot to do and was a very quiet place to stay!

Beautiful stay! Beautiful land! & an absolutely beautiful cabin/house! My boyfriend and his daugter and I loved it!!!! Absolutely the best southern hospitality youll find !!! Fishing was the best part too! Thank you so much for everything and letting me borrow the rod after the tournament through the end of our stay !! We will be back !!!
♥️

Fantastic place to stay! If you are looking for a “home away from home” feel, this is the place. Tranquility and beauty? This is the place! Surrounded by a feel like family atmosphere? This is the place! Tons of things to do in the area when your’re done playing in there private paradise! Ask Jill and Cliff, they know everything! Hahaha

Loved, loved, loved our stay. This was our 2nd trip and we are already planning our next trip. Cliff and Jill went out of their way to make us feel at home. Would recommend to anyone, especially if you like fishing and to e outdoors

Absolutely beautiful cabin! Jill and Cliff were amazing hosts. They were both so kind, very accommodating, helpful with local places to check out. (Although we never wanted to leave)The cabin was so private, peaceful and clean! Our family will definitely be back as soon as we can! We will recommend Jill and Cliff's perfect cabin to all of our friends. We loved the cabin and the hosts so much we all cried leaving.
If you love nature, wildlife, and fishing this is definitely the place for you!

We had such a great stay at Jill’s cabin. Such friendly people that made us feel welcome. Since we have family in Dry Creek we’ve been looking for a place we can comfortably stay at while visiting. We’ve found our place! Cannot wait to come back. Thank you to Jill and Cliff!!

10/10!! Jill and Cliff’s place was perfect. We met family here for the weekend and had a wonderful time. The property was beautiful and peaceful and the hosts provided excellent hospitality. We look forward to being back!

Jill went above & beyond to make our long-weekend comfortable and memorable with our grandsons. They had the absolute best time fishing, seeing all the wildlife & watching the fishing tournaments.
Braxton loved being in the tournament & talking to everyone around him. He wants to come back and fish the lake💙🎣🐟
Thank y’all so much
Theresa, Tommy, Braxton, Brody & Cody
Jill was a super sweet hostess. The area is gorgeous with lots to do right at the cabin. You can definitely relax and spend time there without anything extra.
We had a wonderful time. Beautiful location. People are friendly and helpful.
Jill and Cliff were very friendly and accepting. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! We hope to return again and enjoy some fishing too! It was well worth the drive! Thanks much!
Cabin was clean and organized. Jill was very friendly and helpful. Beautiful surroundings. Was made to feel at home. Will be going for another visit asap.
We absolutely love the cabin and pond. We caught a total of 30 fish while there for two nights. Everything you need for the stay is included, even down to a playpen for your little one.
Clean and comfy. Beautiful views and hosts were super nice. Reba and Butter, the two horses were a hoot!

We had a wonderful two nights at the adorable and roomy cabin. The cabin came well equipped and Jill was kind enough to provide a couple of extra items that we requested. The view is lovely, overlooking a cool pond. We were on the move a lot while we were there so we did not have the opportunity to take advantage of the trails and all there is to do on the property but I would encourage anyone who stays there to allocate some time to explore and hike some of the abundant trails and do some fishing if that is to your liking.
We cannot say enough good things about our trip and cabin stay! We will definitely be back! Thanks to Jill and cliff for making us feel comfortable and welcoming!
We very much enjoyed the stay!

Jill and Cliff were amazing hosts! The cabin, and property, were just what we were looking for on our long weekend trip. We loved the comforts of the cabin, the privacy and our daughter loved the fishing ponds and horses. Couldn’t have asked for a better stay.
This was easily the best Airbnb we have stayed at. Cliff and Jill were amazing hosts and the cabin was perfect for our weekend. We will definitely be returning to spend more time in the future.
We stayed here to go snowboarding at winterplace, and might I just say this was one of the most peaceful and beautiful place I’ve stayed at on Airbnb. I would recommend to anyone!

Absolutely beautiful I felt so at peace and so relaxed this was such a breath of freash air! Jill was so kind hearted and easy to talk too no matter what we needed they were there within minutes! I loved being at their cabin and we already booked our next stay which is worth a million words right there! The kids and us adults were all comfortable being there!

Jill & Cliff were excellent hosts providing everything we needed, graciously showing us around, & making us feel like home over a holiday weekend! We loved fishing & checking out the ponds, while the kiddos loved to pet the horses. Had great photo opportunities all over the place too! Enjoyed a bonfire & night fishing also. Loved being up in the secluded hollows of WV! Beautiful property - we’ll definitely be back!

Almost Heaven: There are no better words to describe this place. Absolutely beautiful. So peaceful and relaxing.
The hosts could not have been nicer, true southern hospitality. If you are looking for the perfect getaway? This is it.

If you want peace and quiet in an absolutely beautiful setting, you need to stay in Jill's cabin. We roamed all over the farm, fished a bit (didn't catch anything, but it was still fun), saw deer and a flock of wild turkeys! The bedrooms are a bit small, but I can't imagine anyone wanting to stay inside for long, with all the space to play outside. We didn't have small children, but it would be perfect for the entire family. The cabin is cozy and has a swing and two rocking chairs on the porch, which we certainly took advantage of. Jill and Cliff are perfect hosts, making us feel so welcome. Can't wait to go back!

My wife and two children wanted a nice weekend that was off the beaten path (but not too far) where we could disconnect from every day life for a couple days. This was the perfect place. My son and I have recently gotten into fishing. This cabin sits right on a big catfish pay lake ( which is free if you're staying there) and also has 4 other ponds to fish other species that you can hike to and enjoy. Jill and Cliff were wonderful hosts. Made us feel comfortable and welcomed. We will be back!!

Completely enjoyed our stay even with the crazy weather elements! Jill and cliff are the sweetest people, eager to invite you to enjoy their beautiful homestead. Absolutely gorgeous not to mention fishing was a blast. We will definitely be returning with some family. They lit up when they realized what they missed! My grown kids won’t make that mistake again!! Hahaha cabin is simply adorable and feels like home away from home! Y’all might wanna consider more cabins in the future, maybe 1 or 2 more. U build everyone will come! With 8 kids we could fill them all!! Hahaha

My Husband and I could never express enough gratitude for the kindness we were show by Jill & Cliff. The Cabin was so very quaint, the porch swing was so enchanting as I set there and looked over the beautiful lake and hillside scenery. I felt like I was inside a picture, just enjoying the ride. My husband enjoyed fishing and Cliff gave him a golf cart to trolley around this huge property. It is very unique to meet such truly kind, and caring people today, But we were very blessed to have been the guest of Jill & Cliff. Thank you for all your kindness
Such a relaxing weekend at this place! Jill is a fantastic host! Loved watching the night fishing. Nothing bad say about the cabin, the host, or the stay. Looking forward to back there soon.
Very clean and welcoming cabin!! The most peaceful place you could ever spend a evening plenty of wildlife to watch and you relax!

Loved staying at the beautiful cabin with lovely views. We saw deer, turkey and an eagle. Caught a lot of fish and loved watching the fishing tournament. A unique experience and if staying in the area. Come here!
My family enjoyed our visit to the cabin. It is a beautiful place.
absolutely gorgeous land. the house was very nice and clean. me and my family really enjoyed staying here and exploring the property. I would definitely come back!

This place is fantastic! Cliff and Jill did anything and everything to make our stay enjoyable. The cabin was great. The views of wildlife from the cabin porch was really fun. We all got a crash course in fishing for big catfish and had a blast biking, hiking, and fishing around the property!
Amazing property! Everything we could have imagined and more. Comfortable. Clean. Peaceful. We will be back!!!
Jill is an excellent host! Great spot!

Loved this location. Fishing a plenty (catfish 10# to 34# witnessed), wildlife galore (deer, turkey, rabbits, and 2 horses), and quiet. You can spend your time in town or you can spend your time at the house relaxing.
Very friendly hosts and beautiful place to stay!
Great place to stay, very clean and well organized. We have already booked you can't go wring with this cabin!!
Very relaxing, very quite, cell coverage can be spotty, could only get LTE. Since that was kind of the point of going to this location that was great.
This was the perfect place for our anniversary weekend! So beautiful, clean, quiet and serene! Jill is so accommodating. We literally wanted for Nothing! And please… have the bbq sandwich too!

We had such a wonderful time on this property. Jill and Cliff are the nicest people you will ever meet. The cabin was perfect, clean, well appointed right in front of the largest pond on their vast property with many ponds.. The cabin was clean and had everything you needed to spend a long weekend. My husband, son and his friend fished until the wee hours of the evening and caught several fish. We used the fire pit and the boys had s’mores and great conversation around the fire. I throughly enjoyed relaxing in the rocking chairs on the porch.. So peaceful. We will be back!

This is a cute cabin with beautiful scenery surrounded by nature. We enjoyed watching deer run around the lake, a cute goose with her babies, feeding the horses, and of coarse the fishing! It was a perfect getaway for our 20 year anniversary 💗

This is the perfect country retreat! It is so peaceful and relaxing. Sitting on the porch listening to the birds was one of my favorite things. The cabin is super cozy and comfortable, it has all the necessities to make it feel like home. We can’t wait to go back again!
Fun fishing, relaxing stay, and nice hosts who live next door. Highly recommend for a peaceful country getaway.

Lovely cabin on a beautiful property. Communication with host excellent. The connectivity is not great is that is an issue for you. It is about 40 minutes to the New River Gorge visitor centers. Great value.
This is a truly lovely and peaceful place to stay, and coffee on the front porch in the morning is the best treat. Jill and Cliff are thoughtful and attentive hosts!
Very Beautiful!!!!
Awesome place! Very cozy! My son loved the horses, the fish pond and the fire pit!! Nice area to walk around.

It was a very nice quote remote location, very beautiful with snow on the ground and without it got to experience both! The horses are amazing and fun to feed. Jill and her husband are amazing people thank you for an amazing stay!!
This little cabin is a great getaway from the city life. Jill's extra directions help you easily find the place and it's a nice area.

The cabin is very nice and as described. We enjoyed the comfort of it. Many reviewers commented on the Bess being comfortable, and I think that is subjective depending on how firm or soft you like the beds. To my family they were not as comfortable as others described. They are firm mattresses and we do not care for firm. Other than that, it was great!

Jill's place is great! It looks like a nice rustic cabin on the outside, but inside its very clean and modern. The shower is great and the HVAC works wonders! The rental sits on their actual property and they also run a pay lake, so if you're a person who loves fishing then this rental is the place for you! Be careful as this rental is some ways down a single land road but in any weather besides a winter storm ( which my group and I had the pleasure of experiencing), you won't have any difficulty navigating.
Beautiful place. …Beautiful atmosphere. The owner was very nice and always there when needed. Comfortable beds and the place was very cozy.

Beautiful location beautiful and loving hosts. You feel like you are staying at a friend’s place. Jill and her husband are Amazing. Being with the horses was a dream come true for my children. Thank you Jill for everything. For all the time the tour, the amazing treats for kids and horses. Thank you

We had an amazing time staying at the cabins. Jill is an extremely great host. We had super fun feeding the horses and my toddler enjoyed that the most. You made his day by sharing the toys and books. The time we came to WV was the perfect time for seeing fall colors and this property is so scenic and serene. We would love to come back and stay at this cabin again.
Beautiful! We had a great time.
Beautiful cabin and area!

This place is a piece of paradise. Jill and Cliff are great people. I’m so happy they share their beautiful property with the other people. We will definitely be back.
Jill and Cliff, thank you for your great hospitality 👍

Great place! Absolutely perfect for our family of 4, my only regret is that we couldn't stay longer! It is definitely not in town, but that's a good thing. Cabin was clean and had everything we could possibly need. We even cought a few fish!

My only complaint is that upon leaving our previous stay we had informed Jill of a few minor plumbing issues in the bathroom, and we were disappointed that none of them had been fixed when we returned 3 weeks later. The worse was a leaking toilet flapper valve that resulted in a whoosh every 10-20 minutes all night long as the tank refilled. As others have noted, this cottage is rustic and that is part of the charm, but I would encourage Jill to get on top of the maintenance. That being said, this is a great stopping point for us, and we will likely stay here again.

This is a unique Airbnb to say the least! The room itself is comfortable, with a beautiful view of the pond. A new deck is there, with the roof still to be built. I enjoyed the stay and would visit again to see the progress of this property. Thanks Jill🙂

I visited with my sisters, and it was an AMAZING stay. The cottage is everything a cottage should be—with eclectic, vintage details and an almost fairytale feel. It was a restful and fun experience!
Enjoyable stay in an old fashioned tiny cottage on a pond, complete with kitties and chickens. A throwback to my Grandma’s time.
Great experience. Jill and her husband are friendly, responsive hosts. Beautiful view from the back deck!

I absolutely loved my stay…it was just what I needed after a long day’s drive…peaceful, quiet, and so relaxing. Wish I’d had more than the one night, but I hope to return on future trips. P.S. Jill’s books are fabulous…I’ll be ordering both.

This place has real character. It's not the most elegant or spacious or modern, but it makes up for it in charm and detail. This tiny home is very comfortable, and the sun rises over the pond in a grand view you can take in through big windows or out on the little deck. We were a little surprised to find the place is just steps away from the main house, but once inside, you are looking out at trees and across the pond out back, so it feels very private.

We stayed at Jill’s place for one night as we travelled down from up North. We liked the idea of staying in a small space reminiscent of a cottage. The space has a lot of vintage details so if you are into that, you will appreciate it. The plumbing fixtures are also vintage so they have wear and tear and while they do go with the theme, just be prepared to do without the same level of comfort as if you were staying in your home. The cottage theme is cute but in keeping with the theme, a lot of the linens and things in the house look a little worn and overused. They are perfectly clean and they have thought about their guests a lot, even baking some of the best zucchini bread we have ever had. The outside, however, really makes this place shine. They have a deck overlooking a pond and it is beautiful! We saw a family of deer, beavers, geese, cats and chickens ! There’s clutter on the outside of the property since they’re still building but the back is nice. Great place for glamping!

I have fallen in love with their Storybook Cottage and Castle home since my first visit 3 years ago.
Staying at their farm is exactly what I need to disconnect.
I come ready for the quiet and peace; prepared to enjoy life, relax and maybe even create a bit of art.
During the days; there are many trails locally to be hiked, caverns explored, waterfalls to behold!
Their land is magical and will offer many opportunities to capture its beauty; the sun rises on the back porch and sets on the front (which is my favorite time to sit across the pond in the back for sunset viewing).
Nature will interact with you and you with them; be it kitties, deer, birds, chickens, and others; such a treat!
Jill's homemade bread is amazing and a perfect treat for morning or night.
Their farm offers you so many ways to interact with nature and just relax, disconnect a bit.
Thank you Jill and Guy for offering this magical little dwelling to those of us seeking!
Can't wait to see you again soon!

Later, the rain stopped, and we did sit on the back deck and enjoyed the view over the pond and hilly pasture behind it. One of the cats came by during our stay and introduced itself. A rooster did begin crowing at 4:00 am, but it was muted, and I rolled over and let it put me back to sleep. We have kept poultry in the past and enjoyed the sounds from the chickens. They do provide rooster ear plugs, but we didn't need them. Checking out is super easy. You just leave. No chores.

Jill has done a great job providing a magical, fairy tale feel to the cottage. We were very comfortable, and she provided amenities that helped make our stay even more enjoyable. These included toothbrush, because I realized I forgot mine! Also, delicious zucchini bread, fresh coffee creamer and more.
The cottage is decorated with a lot of fun items. Antique kitchen sink, vintage table and chairs and a wonderful rocker that I would love to have in my home.
Jill includes games and books to help pass the time if you are so inclined. We enjoyed the back deck, the friendly kittens, as well as observing the roosters, chickens, geese and fresh air while relaxing on the back deck, which provided a perfect view of the sunrise with our morning coffee.
We will definitely stay at Jill’s cottage in the future, if our travels bring us this way.
Oh, the cottage welcome book is filled with fun facts and a great summary of things to do in the area.

But once you get inside, it feels very cozy and inviting, and the back yard’s solitude makes up for the front yard’s lack. Almost all the windows face the back of the cabin where there is a broad deck and a lovely pond surrounded by forest.

I loved my stay at the cottage. This truly was a storybook experience. The tiny house has a beautiful, comfortable bed and provided me with a well-needed great night sleep. The zucchini bread that Jill baked that morning was still warm when I sampled it upon my arrival. I would definitely stay here again!

Jill's little cottage was a wonderful one night stay on our small family trip. She even put out some toys for my son to play with which he enjoyed. I enjoyed sitting on the deck and watching the birds, squirrels, and deer in the back yard overlooking the pond. Very nice and peaceful place to stay on our road trip.
Thank you for a lovely adventure. My granddaughter, Alyonna Kate now has the BEST memory staying in your little whimsical storybook cottage and hope to visit again someday when the weather is warm💕

The zuccini bread was fabulous. The hosts are kind and thoughtful and responsive to any questions or concerns I had. I was glad I had asked about and learned more about their sweet dog instead of assuming. The cats that kept me company are adorable and loving. The place appeared as clean as it could be, though it is rustic. If you camp this would be a very comfortable stay for you. It was chilly and rainy outside when I stayed here, but it was toasty warm inside and I could control the temperature myself if I wanted to. The bathtub and sinks are rustic. Would I stay here again? Yes, I would.

So worried about the weather, drove through fog and rain on the mountains, no visibility, but the directions were perfect because I saw the castle rising out of the mist. This place is like stumbling upon a magical cottage that you know from childhood, except it’s got everything an adult weary traveler dreams of! A big loaf of warm zucchini bread and butter wait for you, and also fruit and snacks and water, which all meant that I didn’t have to go out again into the cold! Hosts had left the heaters and the lights on for me, and I immediately felt at home. A huge bathtub with bubble bath and a tea in the plush and cozy rocking chair snaps the cold right out of you! I spent the evening reading and gazing over the gorgeous pond. Even though the bed had the most comfortable mattress in the known universe, I didn’t want to go to sleep because I didn’t want to waste one moment of my time here. Jill was always super helpful and responsive. I wish I could stay longer; I hated to leave.

What a cute little cottage! Straight out of a storybook! Jill was EXCEPTIONALLY responsive and the stay was flawless! Would certainly recommend staying here if this is something you’re considering. It is exactly as described, a small, quaint, comfy & cozy cottage. Had a very restful sleep and no issues with noise or otherwise. Definitely recommend!!
Amazing zucchini bread! Such a cute and sweet gem filled with whimsy laughter and love. Their animals are adorable and very friendly

The hosts were SO nice and gave us a whole run down of everything. The cabin had brochures and an info manual with a ton of great spots to see. The place was beautiful and a total fairy tail come true. And the zucchini was the best thing ive ever eaten. Perfect experience, illl be recommending to all my friends <3

We had a wonderful time and we can say it is the best Airbnb we have stayed at thus far. The cottage and the animals are a fairy tale come true and the hosts Jill and Guy exactly the sweet and accommodating hosts you would expect for such a magical place. They go above and beyond to make your stay there warm and to leave you with great memories.

Cool place. excellent people.
Killer zucchini bread.
how do I get more?????
Very storybook and charming. Enjoyed the ￼ delicious zucchini bread as well. Will be back again 😊

It was a great place to get away. We had hoped to get some skiing in but weather did nor cooperate so we settled for amazing views at The New River Gorge and fishing in the backyard. The host was amazing informative and sweet. The pond was full of bluegills and bass in the backyard. It was nice to get away from the city for 2 days. Thank you so much!
This was a fairytale come true .....
Jill’s place is a “go to” overnight stop for my frequent trips from Eastern Va to Indiana. It is unique, charming, convenient, relaxing, very well priced…and Jill is a perfect host.

Jill’s place was very cozy with all we needed for a place away from home. It was very quiet with lots of lovable animals that would welcome you as you were coming and going. It was very close to Winter Place that made it easy to come and go during the day for lunch and dinner breaks and then back to the slopes. The zucchini bread with a nice + for our stay. I can’t wait to head that way for our trip to Winter Place.😀
Perfect location for Winterplace skiiing!
Cute and cozy! Perfect place to crash while we skied for a few days. Great local recommendations of a restaurant that was so good we ate there twice!
My favorite air b and b ever

A wonderful find for a ski trip to Winterplace! Literally one minute up the road from the ski resort, this cottage was cozy, cute, and convenient. Lots of fun animal friends around - cats, a dog, chickens, ducks, and we even saw a possum!
The cottage was warm and had plenty of amenities. Jill's dedication to providing quality sustainable and reusable items was really appreciated.
10/10, I'll definitely stay here again if we're back up near Winterplace!
Jill was a great host. She got the room ready early for us since we got there early.
Perfect little place - all we needed and clean! Would stay there again

This cabin was beautiful, the host was very helpful and responded quickly, she even allowed us to extend our check out so we could sleep in. The view was beautiful and the home made zucchini bread was to die for.

Very close to Winterplace ski resort and the cabin was cozy and pretty well stocked. We have a small camper we usually travel in and this cabin had more space than our camper. It was pretty private with a back deck overlooking a pond. This is not luxury accommodations but suited our needs well for our ski trip.

Such a beautiful little cabin in a sweet ski town! The cabin was so nice! Clean, had everything and more that you could need! With the added bonus of her AMAZING zucchini bread as a welcome token! Also it’s hard not to fall in love with all the furbabies on the farm. 10/10 recommend and hope to stay again the next time I’m in the area!
Absolutely loved our stay at the cottage!! We’ll have to come back and see it in the summer ! But the cottage was our perfect home away from home !

Stayed for one night to take my daughter skiing for the first time. It was a magical little cottage to stay in. Right up our alley! We even got homemade zucchini bread, water, butter and cream upon arrival. The cottage was stocked with coffee, tea, toiletries, linens…we only needed to bring ourselves. AND there was a children’s book written by Jill. We bought it when we got home. We had a wonderful stay.

This cottage is a childhood story come true! The grounds were peaceful and beautiful, including all the critters that walked across the porch and played in the yard. The hosts were super friendly and responsive. The zucchini bread is TO DIE FOR. Best bread I have ever tasted. The inside was cute and quaint. It had all the essentials to make that cottage a home for a weekend. Old farm sink, claw foot tub and rustic decorations really can make a guest feel like they are living in a fairy tale. The bed was SUPER COMFY. Even though the cottage was tiny, it was free of clutter and it did not feel small at all. The hosts even had a picnic set up for us to use if we wanted to walk around the grounds and explore with a snack. A perfect dream get away in beautiful West Virginia! I will be telling everyone about this place and I hope to return soon!
Great little cottage, very close to ski resort.
Enjoyed our stayed! Close to winter place and very cozy.

Loved our brief stay at the cottage! Beautiful, cozy, and well-equipped.
Was so fun getting to interact with the friendly cats, chickens, and dog on the property. And Jill's zucchini bread was delicious.
Hope to make it back someday when the weather is nice and the orchard/garden is in production!

We had a wonderful stay with Jill. I made fast friends with 3 tabby cats. They were adorable. We had been at the slopes all day, it had been a cold snowy day and the house was so warm toasty and inviting when we arrived. The house is very whimsical and cozy. We would definitely return.
I loved it
Very homey and inviting with homemade breakfast bread and other amenities. And it was very close to the Winterplace Ski Resort.

Jill’s place was exactly what we needed. It’s cute, cozy, peaceful, and a perfect spot to feel at home away from home! Can’t recommend it enough - the bread was delicious and the cats were soooo cute!
Great spot to stay, Jill was very accommodating and readily available to give directions when needed! Also gave good tips on things to do in the area.

This cottage was beautiful and awesome! We loved every bit of this place and had a wonderful time! The property was so cool. Jill was so friendly and sweet. She met us when we pulled up and let us know about the property. We also loved the cats that played with us and was so sweet. Hopefully they approved of us! We will be back!

I LOOOOVED the storybook cottage. I wish i could have stayed longer, one night just wasn’t enough. Considering I love close to Ghent, I will be coming back. Jill was an amazing host and the property was absolutely gorgeous.

The tiny home is very cute and charming. The pictures show it as it is. The view from the back deck was lovely. The bed is up super high, but a nice little step stool is provided for those of us on the shorter side. It was very clean and the zucchini bread was a lovely touch. The house had a lot of charm. The bed was on the very firm side so take that into account if you have back issues. The only thing we felt odd about is that the house is just a few yards from the host house. You have to walk into the shared gated yard. The hosts were very lovely people though and the animals were adorable. Be sure to close the doors quick, whether your car door or the house door, or a kitten might just sneak in. Lol. Overall, it was a nice stay and worth the price. It was nice that there was not a long list of things to do before leaving, but I felt like we should have done something besides just walk out.
Jill was a wonderful host and her guest house was exactly what I needed while in town for work. Private,peaceful, and fun animals
a perfect example of peaceful serenity! Beautiful place with animals that make you feel loved. The AirBnB was very clean and cozy. Will definitely be back!!
We had 3 amazing nights at Jills. The place is cozy and small, but worth the price. Jill is also a geeat host.

What a magical weekend. A short trip but so worth it. We were welcomed with hospitality and generosity. An experience like this is hard to come by. We loved everything about our time at the cottage and in West virginia. If you’re looking for a peaceful weekend full of kind people, sweet animals and good food you’ve found the place!!

As a solo traveler on a National Park road trip, Jill’s cottage was such a magical and welcome reprieve from being on the road and hiking around all day. I felt right at home, and so welcomed- by humans and animals alike! It’s a beautiful property, a beautiful home, and Jill was so detail oriented it was such a great experience. The little touches like having the lights left on for my arrival and having award winning fresh baked zucchini bread on the kitchen table put everything over the top for me. Thank you for having me!

Jill has a genuine hospitality. You can tell her cottage is a labor of love and attention. She greeted us upon our arrival, and we instantly felt welcomed. She had delicious homemade zucchini bread, fruit, and milk waiting for us in the cottage. Lots of adorable cats, chickens, a dog, and a turkey to entertain us. The view out the back of the cottage is of their pond, and it is very pretty and relaxing from inside the cottage and on the deck.
Cutest cottage ever. Love love love the cats! I will be back for sure!

Jill is an Amazing host! she made my wife and I feel right at home. We have stayed at many Airbnbs but this definitely has been one of our most positive experiences yet! The cats outside were super friendly and the zucchini bread was an awesome way to start the morning the next day when we were checking out. I highly recommend Jill's place and am looking forward to returning again in the future.
Loved the cottage! It was so cute. We made friends with a little kitten that was adorable!
The location was very peaceful and beautiful. The cottage was decorated in such a whimsical manner and I loved it! Would definitely stay again!

What a perfect little gem of a place! Found this listing while last-minute planning for a road trip stop, and boy do I feel lucky I found it. We arrived very late & were still happily greeted by the farm welcoming committee of kitties & the sweetest turkey roosting on the cottage porch. SO very peaceful & perfectly charming, I wished we were staying for more than just a sleep. What a great place for a little taste of farm life, and the delicious zucchini bread was a fantastic way to start our morning before hittin' the road again. Jill had everything we needed & the place was nice and cozy when we arrived. If you're looking for a homey place to rest your head, feel inspired, or escape a busy life for a bit, LOOK NO FURTHER!!! Book now. I hope to come back someday.

This space is perfect for one or two people. Its exactly as pictured. The animals are fun to watch, the pond was beautiful and had lots of birds. If you are a morning person, the sunrise is spectacular. Guy and Jill were helpful in recommending restaurants and they went beyond to help me out today. I appreicate them so much.
If ever in Ghent this is where i will stay again!
We are so happy we found this little gem for a quick stay! Jill was lovely and the space was exactly what we needed. We had such a fun time with all the animals and would totally return!

This truly is a "Storybook" stay, provided by a fairy tale family! I'm in awe of what this family has created, as their unique little cottage is well-worth the stay if you're interested in that "home away from home" feeling. The hospitality provided by the Holliday Family isn't something commercial hospitality can even begin to compete with. From the animal-style welcoming committee, to the freshly baked zucchini bread (award winning by the way, don't let Jill be modest!) there's not a quality about this property where you can't find some sort of innocent joy and amazement, and really -- that's what life's all about.
Even though you're warmly welcomed, you're never "bothered" by this large loving family in any way. In fact, you're made sure to feel that you're well taken care of, but free to come and go as you very well please.
I'm hopeful to visit again one day very soon! Thank you again, Holliday Family, for the experience you provide and sharing your "story" with us all!

This is the cutest Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in!! Jill was incredibly friendly, the zucchini bread she made was delicious, and I enjoyed walking around the property despite the freezing temps! My only regret is that I was only passing through and didn’t get to stay longer. Hoping to make it back one day!

Jills place was unexpectedly great! The storybook cottage was quaint and cozy and Jills zucchini bread was amazing! We loved hanging out with all the friendly animals, especially the turkey and the tiger kitty. We will make a point of staying there again when we go that way. Loved the whole vibe!

This place had so much charm to it; from the animals to the decor, the architecture to the beautiful surrounding mountains! Jill made it so easy for me to check in and out with helpful instructions. She even left delicious zucchini bread for breakfast! Cannot recommend enough!

We really enjoyed our stay at the storybook cottage. We spent most of the day exploring the surrounding areas, and Jill's place was a really nice place to crash in the evenings. It had everything you'd need (coffee + delicious zucchini bread) and the view of the pond in the back with the sunrise was incredible. Thank you for hosting us, we would return.

Jill's Storybook Cottage provided exactly what we needed on our road trip--a safe, clean and comfortable place to spend the night. Jill and her husband were friendly and provided great tips for where to eat and get gas. We enjoyed the orientation they provided to their place and all the animals. Jill's zucchini bread was also a delicious bonus!

We loved our very short stay here! Unfortunately, we were only passing through and arrived late so we didn't get to spend very much time in this cozy nook of a home. But on our arrival, we were greeted by kittens who led us to our front porch just like in a fairy tale. We played a couple rounds of Bingo (found under the bench in the entryway) as we decompressed from the drive. The bed was comfortable and the room was warm. The tap was hot and the view in the morning was beautiful! We sipped our coffee and snacked on our (absolutely delicious) zucchini bread provided by the host on the back deck overlooking the pond in the crisp morning air. After we packed up our car, we took a stroll around the property to take in all of the autumn leaves and peaceful sights (also, accompanied by kittens along the way) before we continued on our journey. We'd love to come back again to truly unwind for a couple of days in the future!

This sweet little cottage was the dessert (cherry on top), to my beautiful vacation in Folly Beach, South Carolina. I was warmly welcomed by her adorable turkey and darling cats. So cozy, and comfy…the zucchini bread was perfect & the spectacular fall foliage reflected on the pond was breathtaking.Very grateful to have found this gem..Thank you Jill ♥️
The cottage was just as pictured. Very convenient location. lots of West Virginia guides to view. Reminds me of my grandmother's house.

What a great stay! We were welcomed by the cats and the turkey. All the details in the cottage are so nice! Wonderful vintage. Highly recommended if you love cats and are looking for something special.

I'ma little late km my review but it was an absolutely marvelous. I loved every single second of it. my bf refused to stay inside bc he just had the time of his life fishing we don't get to relax much but our stay gave us exactly what we needed. thank you so much for a beautiful stay. also sending special love to the 7 cats that I become so close with in a matter of seconds stepping on the property!!
We had a lovely stay as a quick pit stop, I just wish there was more time to enjoy the back deck and bath tub.
This was my second stay at Jill's place. It has everything I need for restful night, the retro kitchen is super cute, and I like waking up to the view.
We stayed here for our wedding night and it was perfect. All the animals where so cute and the zucchini bread was amazing!
Absolutely beautiful little cottage stay. Perfect for a weekend getaway to spend some time relaxing and recharging. They also have the friendliest cats!!!

This was one of my favorite places I've ever stayed on Airbnb! Such a unique, creative, fun experience. The family who owns the property was so kind and accommodating. And I loved all the kitties!
I definitely plan to return one day!
Incredible, can’t wait to come back.
Lovely cabin on a really beautiful property. Loved the views of the pond.

The turkey, chickens, and kitty cats were very welcoming and made me feel at home! The warm zucchini bread was a great touch and tasted delicious. The place is very relaxing and the view off the back deck is wonderful. Everytning I expected
kitten Mecca

The CUTEST place! Jill was so friendly and helpful and the place was so clean! The scenery is so cute and the animals on the property were all so friendly. The turkey and a few kittens jumped into our car on the way out lol. Wanted to take one of the kittens for ourselves. One of my favorite Airbnb experiences, definitely worth the stay!

Everything about Jill’s place was perfect and magical. One day was not enough and we already miss all of the kitties, goofy Merlin and sweet Molly. This was an experience we will never forget. Cannot wait to visit again!

What a unique spot to stop! Loved all the kittens that greeted us and followed us around as we toured the property. We met Guy when we arrived and had a great conversation. Such a cute place. The mattress was a bit firm for our tastes, but everything was clean and lots of nice little touches.

I stopped here just for one night on a road trip to Savannah, but I wish I’d had more time. The cottage and property was beautiful and so peaceful. Jill was very friendly and responsive. She also l made some delicious zucchini bread for my stay!

What a gem! It was worth the short ride off of 64. It met all the expectations of the posted reviews! Spectacular views, comfy bed, delicious zucchini bread and we had the pleasure of a turkey standing outside the kitchen door. We were only there for 12 hours, but wish we could have stayed longer! It’s no wonder Jill’s storybook cottage is constantly booked!

Second time staying at the cottage. It really just seems to be better and better. Got to hang out with cats and Merlin. Beautiful area, the pond is gorgeous, the cottage is pristine… looking forward to the next excuse I get to stay in Ghent.

We loved our little getaway at Jill's place. It was so peaceful and relaxing. We loved being greeted by all of the kittens, turkey, and chickens when we arrived. They were all so friendly and adorable. The cottage was cozy and exactly how it was described. The views outside were beautiful. There was so much to explore in the surrounding areas . We had a wonderful time and created so many memories. We hope to come back soon ! Thanks so much for having us!
Quirky little cottage in rural setting. Just enough room for the two of us. Amazingly friendly and hospitable owners. Loved the cute little touches. Thanks so much for the scrumptious zucchini bread!

What an adorable place to lay our heads for a night, just wish it could have been a longer stay! So many adorable animals and the view of the pond to wake up to was definitelt storybook level magical. The zuchinni bread was such an awesome bonus and treat. Thanks so much for a comfortable and whimsical stay. ❤️

We had a good time staying at the Storybook Cottage tiny house. Jill and her husband are great hosts - very welcoming and friendly. We caught some bluegills in the pond and were accompanied in our fishing by some kittens and a nice little turkey. The zucchini bread Jill provided for breakfast was a welcome touch - and delicious.
Such a cute place and friendly host!

We were looking for something other than a hotel room and found this place on Airbnb. After looking at the site and reading reviews, it was a no brainer for us. It was very peaceful and beautiful. We were planning to only be there in the nights, but did spend a few hours with our 2 grandson on afternoon and it turned out to be a wonderful experience for the boys and us exploring the grounds, fishing, petting to abundance of cats and kittens, along with the young turkey. We were able to some grapes that were ripening. The nights were very quiet and relaxing. There was a loaf of zucchini bread waiting in the kitchen and Guy gave us a jar of homemade dandelion jam to try. We enjoyed the rusted charm that the Storybook Cottage offered.

Absolutely adored my stay at the storybook cottage. Very peaceful and quiet. I loved being greeted by all of the animals and host was very communicative. This place is darling and I’ll absolutely stay again.

Very unique place. It definitely has a storybook feel. Loved sitting on the back deck with wine for sunset and coffee in the morning. The view from the bedroom is lovely. I would only note that there are many many cats and kittens on the property. They would join us for a cuddle anytime we were on the porch. This was delightful for us, but could be a problemfor a non cat lover or someone with allergies.
Jill was so sweet and helpful and accommodating :)

The storybook cottage was everything I hoped for. The place was cozy, quaint, and wonderful. I loved sitting out on the porch watching rain drops in the pond. I immediately felt at home after arriving after a long and arduous Spartan race. Could not have slept (and napped) better. Highly recommend!
We loved our stay at the cottage! Beautiful location and very hospitable host!

Super nice place!!!! Lots of cats, chickens and such a wonderful house!!! Felt like a princess 🌸🌸🌸 The zucchini bread was INCREDIBLE, literally the best!!!! Amazing taste and such a magical experience with tea sitting out on the porch!!! Really memorable experience!
Sweet, eclectic cottage. Friendly hosts and wonderful accommodations. We would definitely head back there in the future.

Unique Airbnb, beautiful surroundings!
Jill was a great host, responsive and gave us local recommendations. We had everything we needed, plus some extras … yum! We enjoyed a walk around the pond with an entourage of friendly animals, saw a beautiful starry sky at night and then enjoyed coffee on the deck while the sun rose over the pond the next morning. Definitely a place we look forward to returning when we come back to explore more of Wonderful WV, with its close proximity of state parks!

A charming little place and lots of critters. Lovely pond view. Jill was very accommodating and she makes the BEST zucchini bread!! It was warm when she brought it. Yum. A cozy night of rest on the road!

100/10
Jill and Guy were the most gracious, helpful, and friendly hosts. The property is incredible and most relaxing. The grounds are full of edible foods in the gardens and trees. The animals love to visit! I cannot wait to stay here again. I will definitely be back throughout the year and only hope they're not always booked! My new favorite place and people. Delicious zucchini bread and dandelion jam!

A cozy spot with a nice little deck and a view of the pond and the sunrise. Loved all the sweet curious animals all around. The cottage is right near their house but still felt private and it had everything for my needs. I would stay here again.

100/5.I was hiking in newriver gorge park, had a medical emergency,had to call 911&ended up going to hospital. By the time they dischrged me it was past 10pm with my car still in the park, i was a solo traveler,everything had shutdown &I had no way to get to my car or even to a hotel close tohospital. Jill was super responsive through chats and Guy graciously drove 45 mins from their home in the middle of the night to come get me, we went got my car& i followed him back home. I cannot say thankyou enough. I have no doubts they are real life fairies among us. The home itself is beautiful, serene, with phenominal surroundings. The home is tiny only in the name, the bed room & bathroom are spacious, with all the supplies one needs, and the pond view is simply spectacular. Equally superb is Jill's zucchini bread, one can travel just for the bread alone. The animals add to the charm. I am already planning my next trip. Please just book this place already everyone, it is soo worth it.

Fantastic place! We loved the pond, critters, and vibe. The little rustic cabin was great, too! We wished we had more time to explore. I will say the rustic cabin had both of our allergies going, but that’s because it’s a rustic cabin lol. Should have brought allergy meds. Overall, really great experience!
Great, cozy space with everything you need. I felt right at home. Definitely recommend.

Great place to stay! I intended to linger and enjoy the view, but my plans changed and I ended up spending far less time here than I would have liked. Wonderful location for a crash pad or a more relaxed stay!

We had such a great stay at the cottage!!! It was so peaceful to sit out on the back porch overlooking the pond and watching the various wildlife. All of the cats and kittens were so fun to interact with! The zucchini bread provided was absolutely delicious and everything within the cottage was as described! There are lots of recommendations within the cottage. Guy spoke with us a few times to check in and provide recommendations tailored to what we desired to experience. Overall great experience!!
a wonderful retreat off the beaten path

It was easy to find this location, as the castle they are turning their house into, is easily spotted from a distance, so no need for complicated instructions.
We were warmly welcomed by Guy, and he talked a bit about the area and other things. You will never run out of conversation with him, I think. I love this, as airbnb travel for me, is to get to know the area as well as some of the people living there.
The tiny house is not too tiny, and very comfortable. We had fun exploring its nooks and crannies, and also the extensive grounds that surround it. What a beautiful and peaceful spot.
If I have to name one negative side, it was the bullfrog that kept us awake at night, until we got used to the sound :)
There are some lovely hikes in the area and some good restaurants too.
If we're ever in the region again, we'll definately consider staying here again.

This stay was honestly magical. The cottage was picture perfect and the whole atmosphere felt welcoming. We stayed at the Storybook Cottage for four nights and we wish we could have stayed there longer. It felt like stepping into the past. The cottage was decorated so nicely and the animals were very friendly. The cats were especially playful! Guy was so kind to give us a tour of the property and he even let us try out his antique tools! The pond view from the bedroom is really phenomenal. We were out at the New River Gorge every day and we looked forward to coming back to the cottage every night. Jill’s zucchini bread is simply to die for. It was so good that we almost finished the loaf in one sitting! We felt so welcomed and at home. If we are ever in West Virginia again, we would definitely come back, and it is a 10/10 recommended place to stay in our book. Jill, thank you so much for the wonderful experience! We hope your castle gets finished soon! - Pam & Mario
Enjoyed our second stay just as much as our first!
Our “fairy tale” airbnb stay was lovely and peaceful. Jill is an amazing host and her breakfast bread treat was OUT OF THIS WORLD!!!

It is so cool walking up to the front of the Storybook Cottage! The kittens meeting you at the driveway to say welcome to our little house. Finding the antique keys to the awesome antique dish drain sink to the claw foot tub! It is the most unique, fun place we have ever stayed at! The view off the back porch is picturesque! The sun was setting and I hope I will be able to share a photo I took.
Will be back! Went to the best Italian restaurant in of places a strip mall! Padrinos! 5 stars 🌟
We were also pulling a boat and they had great parking and even helped unhook the boat so we could go to dinner! Took a walk around the pond and saw a cute little bridge and a very old looking little log cabin!
So peaceful! Saw three deers this morning when we woke up out in the field behind the pond. Great place!
Jill's little cottage was perfect and adorable! The view of the pond off the deck was amazing.
Beautiful and peaceful location. Felt like had traveled back in time. Kind and courteous hosts.

My son and I were driving back from the beach. We needed a place to stay that was about halfway, but all I could find were expensive hotels that didn’t look that nice. I lucked into finding this place! The hosts, Jill and Guy, could not have been any nicer. They went out of their way to have toys and snacks on hand for my toddler. And the zucchini bread was as good as advertised!
While we were only there for a total of 12 hours or so, I’m very glad we stayed.

The cottage was a welcome oasis after a day of driving. The interior was so cute and the pond view could not be beat. The hosts provided a lot of information and thought through so many gorgeous details. The friendly dog and bevy of cats was a definite plus! We look forward to staying again on our drive back.

My husband and I had a fantastic little getaway at this adorable, storybook cottage! Jill was amazing and very friendly. The place was so quaint and exceptionally clean. All of the cats were very friendly, and I even helped out a mother cat give birth to five kittens!!! Definitely recommend checking it out!
Like staying in a little Harry Potter cottage! It was perfect!!!
Jill and her husband were so nice and accommodating. the place was clean and perfect for a short stay like ours. I'd highly recommend it!

Storybook cottage is so adorable! It has many interesting antique items. It's like stepping back in time only you get an air conditioner, wifi and a full bathroom! After a long day of hiking and driving it was absolutely wonderful to take a bubble bath in a big deep claw foot bathtub and drink fresh lemon balm tea. We were serenaded by frogs as we fell asleep in a comfy bed! The property is filled to the brim with interesting things. There are two small museums, fruit trees everywhere, a grapevine canopy for sitting under and cooling off, friendly cats that follow you as you walk around the pond. The host gave amazing advice about what to see and do. One of the highlights of our vaca was hiking a water fall at Brush Creek that the host suggested. He was a wealth of knowledge and we really appreciate all his input. Would definitely stay again!

We had such a delightful one night stay at Jill’s place. Enjoyed the beautiful calm surroundings in nature. Loved the view looking out the windows. Delicious dinner at The Dish, a local restaurant recommended by Guy. And the highlight of our trip - Jill’s delicious homemade zucchini bread!!
This is the third time I’ve stayed there, and it was wonderful… as always!
Second time staying and Jill’s place was just as beautiful! She is very polite and makes you feel like you are right at home! 10/10 recommend!

Loved my brief stay at Jill's. Loved the country and retro vibe. AC was wonderful, bed super comfortable and Jill was very responsive. Location just of the interstate was very convenient. Would definitely stay again next time I'm traveling through beautiful WV.

We only stayed here for a night because of our schedule - but we wish we had had more time to enjoy the place. Jill's place would make a perfect getaway if you'd like to just relax, forget about the real world, and enjoy nature for a while. The complementary banana nut cake also makes a very good reason for us to come here again!
Also, get ready for the cats - they are overwhelmingly sweet and welcoming!

Jill goes above and beyond to make you feel right at home. The cottage is super cozy and welcoming. She has everything you could need and even leaves fresh zucchini bread for each guest. 10/10 recommend and would definitely stay here again

This was my 2nd stay at Jill's. I love the little cottage and the land surrounding it. I always have a very relaxing and peaceful time here. I love the whimsical nature of their homes and property, rather magical with the animals, flowers, pond, etc. Jill and Guy are wonderful & caring people and I love their vision! Looking forward to my next visit!

Cottage was very cozy and relaxing. Cats were very friendly. Didn’t get the opportunity to explore the property because it rained the 3 days we were there. I plan on returning again in the future. Jill was very pleasant and welcoming. Loved our visit.

What an awesome surprise! I love love love this little cottage, everything I could want was here (including zucchini bread still hot from the oven!). The atmosphere was perfect, and falling asleep to the sound of bullfrogs and light rain was so nice.

Absolute gem of a place! Jill and Guy are friendly and the surroundings are beautiful. This is a must-stay if you are in the new river gorge area and love a unique air bnb. We are already planning to return. :)

The Storybook Cottage is a dream stay. Guy and Jill are such nice and inviting people and make sure you feel as welcome as possible with homemade, fresh baked, delicious zucchini bread. Guy was really cool to talk to and told us about how many interesting people he’s gotten to meet over the years staying there. It was really inspiring personally to see how the space they have to with with has been cultivated over the years and only continues to steadily grow. The whole place is enchanting and an amazing testament to what honest, hard working people can accomplish with their own hands. It’s a true work of art and I highly recommend it to anyone who wants a dose of real magic in their travels. The location is a peaceful spot in the country, with a beautiful private pond out back of the cottage. Very cozy, very cool.
Great location and really nice host.

It was a perfect stay for me and my boyfriend! We wished we had stayed longer! Super cute and quaint, clean and AMAZING zucchini bread. Jill was even nice enough to bring us a case of water when we ran out lol. The hosts were so kind and welcoming.

Beautiful, quiet location, Main house is indeed, in the construction process of being turned into a castle. Easy parking. Cottage is cozy & easily accessible. Dog lovers, however, will not approve of how the Leonberger (Leonberger mix?), is kept: outside apparently all the time (holes dug, fur rings in the grass) on a Clothesline Dog runner. This is a very cute, quirky, one of a kind cottage. The pond view from the bedroom is beautiful.
Couldn’t have been more perfect for the night and the zucchini bread was delicious.
We absolutely loved our stay! The cottage is so cute and we loved watching all the cats :) the zucchini bread was a wonderful breakfast!

Jills place is cute and whimsical-
