Beautiful surroundings!
Jill was such a welcoming host. An incredibly unique stay that fit our needs perfectly. Would definitely stay here again in the future!
Jill was great and very hospitable. she responded quickly and was willing to help with any concerns. The place was very peaceful and I hope to return.

The view from the balcony during sun rise and sun set is second to none. Jill and Guy greeted us when we got there and then gave us our privacy the rest of the stay. Cannot wait to come back to walk the property and do some fishing. Absolutely unbeatable for the price!

We absolutely loved this place. It was super charming and the decor matched the cozy vibe. The view of the pond was beautiful, and the entire experience was really heartwarming. Jill and Guy were super friendly, and they made us appreciate the area even more. (We also loved the homemade zucchini bread they gave us!) Would totally recommend to anyone looking for a homey stay!
Cute place as described
We had a peaceful night stay at Jill’s location. Jill’s place had all the amenities you could possibly need, she was a wonderful communicator and view from the bedroom was so picturesque.

This was my second stay at the cottage and just as great as the first. The cabin is so cozy and I love the view of the pond from the balcony. Very convenient access from the highway for those who are staying overnight while travelling. Great place to stay with a great host!

Cozy cottage in a serene setting - perfect for two road weary travelers from Louisiana on a long trip to eastern Canada. Before our trip, Jill was very responsive to a few kitchen questions. She is a wonderful host & makes a mean, nut-free zucchini bread & jam; the fresh fruit, cream & bottled water was also a nice surprise. We had everything we needed for our stay. We loved how most everything in the cottage was repurposed for logical use.
One day is not enough because there is much to enjoy. Quiet, quirky little place. The warm zucchini bread and dandelion jam were wonderful. Such an interesting stay.

Jill is an amazing host! Her place is so serene and beautiful. She made us zucchini bread and jam for our arrival, and her husband let us know of many local things to do while in the area. Definitely plan to come back again soon!
We spent our honeymoon at the cottage and it was amazing. The bread and jam was the best❤️ and they were the kindest hosts.

Jill’s place was exactly as described and a great place to spend the night on our drive up the interstate. Communication was excellent. The accommodations were warm and comfortable. The zucchini bread put the entire experience over the top!
We really enjoyed our stay at the story book house. Especially enjoyed fishing in the pond. We felt right at home, and enjoyed the unique atmosphere.
Jill and Guy are great hosts. I’ve never felt so safe and at home at an airbnb before!
We cant wait to see what the final project will look like when it is 100% finished.

My time at Storybook Cottage was amazing! Jill and Guy were very friendly and welcoming. The cottage and property are peaceful and stunning. I felt right at home the entire time. Jill's zucchini bread is sooooo good, too! I will definitely be back!

Lovely cottage. Second time to visit and hope to return. Jill is a wonderful host. Guests are greeted with a loaf of delicious homemade zucchini bread - yum! If you are in the area, check out this adorable cottage.

Jill went out of her way to dream and provide a place that was filled with thoughtfulness.

Grateful for my time to visit!
Thank you Jill and family!

Absolutely loved staying here. I felt right at home and loved all of the thought that went into the place. Would love to come back one day and highly recommend for anyone who wants a relaxing and peaceful getaway!
The Storybook Cottage was exactly what we needed. Peaceful and just perfect. I can't wait to come back when the castle renovation is complete for a longer stay.

The storybook cottage was exactly what we needed after a day on the road! We booked the same day as our arrival and when arrived Jill was there to great us! The cottage had everything we needed! The zucchini bread was delicious! Definitely will stay there again!

My girlfriend and I stayed here 2 nights and we are already dreaming of coming back. We never did see Jill, but Guy did a great job of substitute Inn Keeper. Very beautiful place to stay. The theme was really neat.

Beautiful view out the bedroom window. Nice touches like fresh fruits and bubble bath. Just as described. Easy to find with well marked mailbox and tiny houses on the road. Very close to the highway Kitchen well stocked. Not many restaurants near by so bring food to cook or rewarm.
Listing was as described. Cute place, nice surroundings, comfortable. Was happy with my stay.

This was the best experience I have had at an Airbnb! Jill and Guy were incredibly friendly and went out of their way to welcome us and make us feel at home. We will absolutely be returning if we're ever in the area again!

Magical and fairytale like truly!

Loved Jill's place!! I had a wonderful and comfortable stay, and the homemade zucchini bread was amazing!

Jill's cabin was charming, unique, and comfortable with everything we needed for a happy stay - plus delicious zucchini bread! Very convenient to Winterplace too!

Jill was very responsive and a great host.Definitely recommend coming here for your stay,her zucchini bread is to die for.
Jill is a great host! Great place to stay also, has beautiful views, great amenities, and many more we will be back

Within 25-30 minutes of multiple entrances to The Park. Restaurants, grocery, pharmacy, gas within a few minutes of the house. Ended up being a great home base and comfortable enough to hang around in.

Stayed here two nights while passing through on a road trip. The plan was to stretch our legs for a day; visit ACE Outdoor Adventure park and do some hiking. Location was solid for this.

This place is great! It was extremely cozy and clean. Christine is an excellent host and I would highly recommend staying here.

We stayed here for a few days. We wanted to visit the new river gorge national park. The park was about 20-30 mins away but the place was such a great value compared to other nearby places. It’s small but really clean and cute and great for the two of us. Would highly recommend.
Great place to stay!
Christine was a great host. She provided great local recommendations and was very responsive. Check in a breeze and the space was very comfortable. I’d recommend to all.

Christine was an excellent host and she was very accommodating. We visited during the week and during the off-peak time season.. She gave us great recommendations for where to go and what to do during our short stay.

Christine's place is a perfect home base for checking out the New River Gorge, or a lovely stopover on a longer journey. The space is comfortable, clean, and charming. And Christine is responsive, helpful, and warm.

We arrived at Emerson and Wayne just after a bad thunderstorm had hit the entire area. The cabin had no power but Catrina and Jack ran the generator for us so we had everything we needed. The power was eventually restored thank goodness!
The cabin was beautiful, there were fresh flowers with a personal note and a treat basket including some amazing cookies to welcome us to our new home for a few days! The fresh farm eggs in the fridge were an added bonus!
The cabin was immaculate and the kitchen was well equipped.
The location was awesome, so quiet and peaceful, we slept great. With a short drive we were close to so many hikes and great places to eat. We loved our stay and we plan on going back. Hopefully the next time we will have time to enjoy the hot tub and fire pit, we just have to stay longer!
Catrina and Jack are great hosts, they always responded quickly and they were so helpful. Emerson and Wayne is definitely a hidden gem!

The Emerson and Wayne, cozy cabin is AMAZING and a wonderful place to stay! Catrina and Jack have provided a spectacular vacation destination. The cabin interior is luxurious, plus the outdoor living spaces are surrounded by the beauty and tranquil sounds of nature!
Catrina, goes the extra mile as a host 100%. When we arrived there was a hand written welcome note, meats and cheeses for a charcuterie board, farm fresh eggs, fresh flowers and treats for our dog. The small added touches speak volumes and we greatly appreciate it!
Thank you for everything and being a top notch host,
Kamon, Beth Ann and Mildred

The cabin was awesome. Our Golden Retriever made it up the stairway to the loft just fine. Easy entry. Easy to find. Kitchen totally well appointed. Outside area serene & loved the creek. Bed was comfy, bath shower was wonderful. Catrina is definitely a super host.
An amazing little cabin that was a perfect get away. Best ABNB I’ve stayed at in a long time!

Our stay was fantastic! This place has it all! Beautiful area, clean and inviting cabin. I really loved everything about this place. The hot tub was wonderful after our 6 mile rim to rim run. The heated bathroom floor and towel warmer felt amazing! Just all around a great place to stay. My only complaint is that the hot water in the shower doesn't last very long so if you take long showers, you're probably going to run out of hot water by the end of it.
I would 100% stay here again.

Spent three days hiking in the area. This was our homebase for a few nights. Enjoyed a nightly fires, soaks in the hot tub, and the beauty of nature all around. Was very pleasantly surprised with some local snacks on arrival. Worth every penny. We loved our stay. Honestly-kinda just want to move in forever :)

One of our favorite Airbnbs we’ve ever stayed in! The cabin is exactly as pictured and so many lovely welcoming touches are added like fresh flowers, farm fresh eggs and a charcuterie box that made for the perfect picnic. We had a couple of questions throughout the stay and Catrina always responded quickly and helpfully. We loved this cabin and all the many gorgeous parks nearby so we’ll definitely return.

My wife and I had an amazing stay at this Airbnb. There was a gift box and the place looked amazing. The hot tub was wonderful as well. Also, the bathroom has heated floors, which feels pretty good on the feet in the morning. I totally recommend this place and hope to stay there again when we come back.

We have stayed at many airbnb’s over the years and this one tops all of them!! This home came with everything you could possibly need, which was super convenient when traveling. The host was super responsive and even left up the cutest welcome basket for my fiancé, pup, and I. Also, this place was super clean and the linens smelled amazing. We HIGHLY recommend this airbnb and definitely will be coming back!

My friend and I agreed that this was the best Airbnb either of us have ever stayed in. It looked exactly like the pictures! Absolutely beautiful and homey. Our favorite parts were the screened-in porch, towel warmer, hot tub, and loft bed. Our stay was in April, and though it was rainy and cooler, we had the screened-in porch and hot tub that allowed us to still enjoy our time there. We loved making tea and hot chocolate and sitting under the cute lights on the porch to read. Catrina is a friendly, communicative, and generous host! The welcome gift basket was such a sweet surprise. We both will likely be back someday!
This was a really great place with all the details clearly well thought out. We would definitely stay here in the future.
Such a perfect place for a getaway while exploring the nearby parks. The peaceful setting (and hot tub) were just what we were looking for after a day of hiking.

Wow!
I think that I can fairly say that this was one of the best airbnb's that I have stayed in.
The interior smelled of wood and amber.
The outdoors was like stepping into an aromatherapy shop.
Watching the wildlife was incredible.. from seeing deer, wild turkeys and hearing owls hooting at each other the first night I arrived. I believe them to be great horned owls. The fact that the airbnb was pet friendly was also nice. She offered things from pet beds to pet blankets. Food bowls, etc. The welcome basket was very nice as well and a thoughtful touch in the case you don't bring any snacks. I had my first biscotti here! I also loved the hottub... after a day of hiking.
Thank you Catrina. If my travels bring me back here, I will definitely be a returning customer :)

Our stay at Catrina's adorable cabin was the perfect location for my husband and I to spend our anniversary! And because we were able to bring our two pups with us it made our stay that much more special. Catrina was amazing at communicating with us and even left us a basket of goodies with an anniversary card. We'd highly recommended staying at her place especially if you want to bring your extended fur-family with you!

Stayed at Catrina's cabin for my 60th birthday and couldn't have been more thrilled with the experience! The cabin was immaculate and was stocked with everything we could possibly need. It was so peaceful and a perfect nature getaway. Catrina was an exceptional host, extremely responsive to messages. She even left a me a birthday card, fresh flowers, and lots of snacks and goodies! So thoughtful! Sadly it was cloudy the night we were there, so couldn't see the stars from the bed at night. But we enjoyed listening to the stream as we slept!
I would 100% recommend staying at this beautiful cabin.

I loved my weekend at Emerson & Wayne, an immaculately curated cabin along a beautiful little creek. The basket of treats including cookies from a local bakery was a delightful surprise. The cabin was very cozy and charmingly decorated indoors and outdoors. Everything was spotless when we arrived. Hiking during the day and getting to enjoy the hot tub in the evening was a delight. I would love to come back in the summer to make more use of the sun porch, deck, and firepit areas.

What a beautiful cabin for a long weekend stay! Couldn’t have been happier with property. Catrina was a wonderful host who responded quickly to any messages. We loved our stay and would highly recommend it to others!
Beautiful home with everything you could possibly need - Catrina truly thought of everything. Loved using the hot tub after hiking!

E&W provided a serene and peaceful atmosphere for us to relax after long days of hiking. Catrina went above and beyond with thoughtful little details around the cabin for both our husband and I and our pups. The place smells amazing and welcoming and the design and layout are perfect.

Catrina's place is exactly how it was described and 100% like the pictures. The place is adorable and so comfortable. Not to mention how spotless it was. Close to hiking trails, restaurants, New River and Gauley River. It was the perfect weekend get-a-way.
Will definitely stay there again.
Wow I can’t say enough good things about our stay here! Catrina was so responsive and just a fantastic host. The cabin was so clean and beautiful and welcoming! 100% we will be back!

Our stay at Emerson and Wayne was everything we hoped it would be. The cabin was just as described. The welcome basket was a sweet surprise! I loved listening to the sound of the creek from the screened porch and the firepit area. So relaxing! Thank you for such a lovely place to celebrate our 26th anniversary ❤️

We arrived on an unseasonably warm 75deg early March day. We were immediately struck by the beautiful cabin, enhanced by the thoughtful touch of fresh flowers. The cabin's small amenities, such as farm-fresh eggs and locally sourced cookies, added warmth and local flavor to our experience. We came to New River for our “baby moon”; a short getaway before the birth of our second child. We had several wonderful meals, particularly The 304, which not only was excellent but it had affordable prices. We enjoyed breakfast at Wood Iron Eatery, which powered our hike at Long Point, which we recommend for both tranquility and breathtaking views.
Our time at Emerson & Wayne was filled with moments of peace, culinary delights, and the welcoming embrace of nature. Thank you for providing such a splendid backdrop to our special getaway.
We celebrated our 6th anniversary here! It was such a peaceful and relaxing weekend. The place is so cozy and clean. Would love to come back!
Absolutely beautiful cabin! One of the nicest stays I’ve had!

My fiancé and I came to the area to relax and do some hiking. It was such a beautiful space and Catrina was very easy to work with in booking. We would like to come back in warmer weather so we can sit in the screened in porch. One of the nicest places we have ever stayed! Thank you so much for everything!!

We loved the value we got compared to staying at Ace and other places in the area. I loved the welcome basket with goodies and all the amenities available to us making us feel right at home. This property is a piece of Appalachian luxury I will be sure to return to! We were also able to check in early free of charge, which was super convenient!

We had a wonderful time here! A quiet cabin getaway with state of the art comfort. I wish I could rate it 6 stars just for the snacks alone! Fully stocked kitchen for cooking -or- Just 15 minutes away from Fayetteville if you wanna grab a bite. Thanks for hosting us!
Flawless. Might not be the best for a toddler. Too many things to break and the stairs made us nervous. Otherwise it was perfect!

The cabin was so clean and had everything right at our fingertips. I
The hot tub was amazing. Our stay was so relaxing, and the location was convenient to nice restaurants and grocery stores. We will definitely keep this on our list for a repeat trip!! Thank you so much for being the best host!!!

We had a wonderful stay at Catrinas place. Very nice, new and cute cabin. Absolutely loved the screened porch and deck, which made the place feel even bigger.
Nice bonus are the heated bathroom floors and towel warmer. Those floors are wonderful on a cold morning! The shower was also fantastic. Good water pressure and nice overhead shower heads.
The bed was very comfortable, and the appliances all worked well.
The place has basically everything you would need and we appreciated the aluminum foil and spices left out as well as the extras in the welcome basket. I had looked for a whisk with no luck, but that's getting pretty picky.
All in all it's a great little cabin that's perfect for a getaway and vacation.
Most importantly, we would stay again!

I have been using Air bnb since 2016 and can say that this was simply the best place I've ever stayed. It's a beautiful cabin in a beautiful area, every amenity you could think of is available, there was amazing attention to detail, and let's not forget the HEATED BATHROOM TILE. The gift basket upon arrival was so thoughtful and started our amazing stay in such a wonderful way. Great hosts and we will be back!

absolutely beautiful! i had such a great time and Cat is such an amazing host! there are so many hiking locations with a great soak in the hot tub after! such a quiet and lovely cabin. the place is more beautiful than the pictures :) i can’t recommend this place enough :))

This cabin was perfect! It was a great weekend get away! Plenty to do at the cabin and in the area!
The cabin was cozy and decorated so cute!
The cabin was amazingly nicer than I imagined. Everything was spotless. Catrina was excellent at answering any questions I had…and got back to me almost immediately. I will definitely be coming back.

This is the best AirBnB we have ever visited! The pictures were synonymous with reality. This cabin had everything we needed- from parchment paper, to basic cooking spices, lots of blankets, plenty towels, all the glasses and plates, a Bluetooth speaker, reliable wifi/tv, and more! Our host left us a sweet little basket with a welcome note and snacks. We really enjoyed watching deer while we were sitting in the hot tub. This was exactly what we have been needing. We enjoyed every minute we spent here and will be back for our next trip to NRG!
PS if you are coming from an Urban area: Keep in mind that you are going to a rural area- the roads are curvy leading to the cabin. We have been in this area before and it doesn’t bother us at all that it is out in the woods! Travel in the light hours if you are not experienced in driving on back roads.

We really enjoyed our stay at Catrina's house! Very well appointed with beautiful decor and sooo cozy! We especially loved the hot tub & peaceful setting. Catrina was very responsive and made check-in/out super easy!

Catrina’s place was exactly as described and even exceeded our expectations. It was private, cozy and very welcoming. Catrina left goodies for us and our dogs to enjoy during our stay. The place was super clean upon arrival and everything was perfect. Catrina was also extremely responsive with her communication. Great place in a great location.

This cabin was beautiful and very homey. We visited for my girlfriend and I’s anniversary. We’re from Baltimore so it was nice to sit outside on the porch and look at the beautiful surroundings. Thank you for a peaceful get away and the gift basket! Highly recommend spending some time here to anyone.
Great stay!

I absolutely loved this place and will return. Catrina was extremely responsive and helpful!. The place was gorgeous and so peaceful. I very much enjoyed this place. I highly recommend this to everyone.

AMAZING place to stay! We were celebrating our anniversary & Catrina was incredibly thoughtful & surprised us with roses, chocolates & sparkling cider to celebrate! She also provided a snack basket that included local goodies that were delicious! Extremely clean, inviting & cozy space, friendly host, well stocked kitchen, quiet & relaxing spot to unwind. Highly recommend! ❤️

Perfection! There is nothing else to say! Our family of four and our fur baby stayed at Catrina’s for 4 nights! The cabin is amazing! It has everything you need and more! There was a goodie basket for our family and items for our dog! My kids loved the s’mores fixings, the hot cocoa, and the color additive for the fire pit! The cabin is central to everything we did from NRGNP, Babcock SP, Hawks Nest SP, and other attractions. The hot tub was a great way to end our daily hikes and the bathroom is a dream! This was a perfect fall break getaway!

Grab your food and clothes, anything else you'll need for a pleasant stay is already there! Catrina goes above and beyond.
She had a goodie basket not only for us but our furry friends as well. I highly recommend this rental. We hope to be able to reserve this cabin again for our next visit to Fayetteville.
Bill Rice & Kelley Anderson
Greensboro, Ga

E&W has definitely been our favorite airBNB to date! You can tell Catrina put a lot of love into this super cute and comfy cabin. When we arrived there was a welcome basket for ourselves and even one for our dog! We instantly felt right at home. Location is perfect for New River Gorge National Park- which is why we were visiting the area. Catrina was also nice enough to send us local eateries and “to dos”- we checked out Pies & Pints from her recommendation and absolutely LOVED it! Absolutely recommend this beautiful cabin!! (If you’re like me, you’ll want to put in a double shower head and heated bathroom floors after your stay.. literal heaven)
Such a cool cabin, with all the comforts of home, nestled in the woods with a stream in the back yard.

Catrina went the extra mile to make our stay amazing. She had fresh flowers and a goodie basket for our dogs as well as for us.
She supplied coffee and she thought of everything we’d need. You can tell extreme care and thoughtfulness went into every detail.
There is a cute little stream outside and she supplied firewood for us. Catrina is definitely the best airbnb host we’ve ever had.
When we asked for a more private place to walk the dogs she sent a detailed description of where we could go.
We were off the beaten path but also close to Fayetteville which has everything you’d need. The area is breathtakingly beautiful.

This little gem is an absolute treasure in the woods! Very quiet, serene setting, back in the mountains. The cabin was so clean and the decor was perfect. Catrina and Jack were very kind and responsive to all of my questions! Amenities were perfect! 10/10 recommend and would certainly stay here again.

A perfect, lovely, serene location! A ln immaculate cabin with a wonderful personal touch! Amenities were thoughtful and personalized! Host qas extremely responsive and kind! Can't say enough kind things or recommend it enough!

My husband and I stayed for a few days, we loved Catrina’s place. We recommend 100% this lovely home, it is warm, very cozy and peaceful. It was worth it definitely a big deal. A convenient location, there are very fun activities around.

We couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay while exploring the New River Gorge National Park!! The cabin is so well put together and the awesome hosts make it the perfect place to vacation to. We can’t say enough great things about our trip and will recommend it to everyone! Thanks again and can’t wait to return!! 😊

What a gem! This cabin is cozy, inviting, romantic. My husband is a contractor and kept tapping on walls and saying wow they didn’t spare any expense. We were in town for a Spartan race, and cooked almost every meal here. We had everything we needed and more- you could literally just show up with groceries and stay put. I’m face we seriously considered skipping the race and doing just that! But coming back to the hot tub was worth it. Speaking as a picky city girl, I was so comfortable.
There is a road next to the cabin that leads to a dead end so the only traffic is local. We were a little surprised how many cars drove by, maybe a few an hour, but otherwise it was quiet and peaceful, and private.
Epic little getaway down in the hollar. Super comfortable, private and well equipped.
great cute little place for a getaway close to home and perfect if ya need room for a special guest aka granddaughter to spend a day with
Our stay was confirtable and the place had everything we needed. Thanks for being a pet friendly host.
Very friendly and accommodating. Everything was as described. Bed was surprisingly compfy. We sleep very well, even being that close to the road.
Very cute home, very clean and a great value.
house was as described, clean and was easy to find. Well worth the price.
We thoroughly enjoyed staying here. It was convenient to family and just a beautiful setting with the brook and train tracks!

The house was cute, very clean, and a perfect size for two couples. Shelving and TVs were located in each bedroom and were greatly appreciated. We enjoyed the fire pit (although previous tenants had left it full of plastic that we had to dig out) and the outdoor space a lot. WiFi was spotty on occasion but that is expected for this area. Light sleepers may struggle here, but the sound machines were very nice!
Such a wonderful place. Very well put together. With some history with all the modern conveniences

Home was very clean and easy check-in. The traffic was loud in the front rooms but they had sound machines to help. The house is older and a bit drafty but the heat warmed it well. It had everything we needed and was very comfortable. Would stay here again if back in the area.
Will definitely stay here again in the future !
If I find myself back in the area, we will be staying again! The home was everything we needed and had so much charm.
Great location for why we were visiting. Comfortable beds and all the necessities you would need.
Tony is a great host. House was in a good area with a good views. I would stay here again
Tony was fast to respond. House was comfortable. Would stay here again.
Nice place to stay!
Very clean space. Looked exactly like the pictures. Responsive host.
Nice stay.
Tony was very quick to respond and GREAT at allowing me to arrive a little early since I was driving in from out of state with my dog.
Had no air conditioning, but stated he was getting it installed soon.
Great location, very close to the riding park. Very clean and well kept. Would stay again!
Easy check in and a nice, clean stay. Responsive hosts. No AC currently working but good fans were provided. Everything was cozy and just like it looks in pictures.
great stay!
Tony’s place was a fantastic and cute place to stop during our family trip! Loved the quaint location and coziness of the house. Pet friendly, and looking forward to booking with Tony again!
Great stay!

Adventure House was absolutely wonderful! The home itself is very cute, decorated beautifully, and comfortable. The area is easy to navigate and close enough to Beckley proper to be convenient, but far enough out to enjoy the quiet and peace of the country. Tony is a fantastic host who is very responsive and friendly! Definitely a 5-star experience across the board and highly recommend to anyone visiting the Beckley area!

Make sure you have the correct address!! Air BNB is wrong. the correct address is 231 Central Street, Lester, WV!! Beckley is not correct and not even in the right direction. That was the biggest issue we had, but simple fix. Overall was a cute little place to stay! Super clean and had plenty of kitchen items! Would stay again.

My husband and I with our baby stayed at Tony's overnight as we were traveling. Cozy home, very comfortable and clean, easy to find. I liked that they put up pictures of what they had in the kitchen, it makes it easier to plan if we were staying longer. Tony messaged and was available if we had questions. There are train tracks in the pictures behind the house but we didn't hear any go by. My only complaint is the street traffic noise, which there isn't anything you can do about that. When you stay here if you have a sound machine that will help with any noise. Our baby slept just fine in the back room with a sound machine. My husband and I heard some cars going by in the night in the front room but I don't think we lost any sleep over it. The beds and furniture were all very comfortable. Overall, we had a very pleasant experience.
Very nice and comfy place. Felt right at home!

A storm had blown in and taken out all the power but Renee was helpful. we ended up not staying because of the power outage and she gave us a full refund even though she wasn't responsible for the storm. She was quick to help and very understanding. we thought the place was so cute and wished we could have stayed. We'll definitely keep her inind for another time.
I chose this place because it looked like a home I could live in, and I was not disappointed. Absolutely beautiful. If I could've plucked the cottage up and put it in my backyard, I would have!

Renee's Country Cozy Cabin has a very unique charm. It's very welcoming and unlike any other places I've seen. A lot of care and considerations must have went into it.
Renee was perfect. She was understanding of my travel situation and accommodated my needs. Communication with Renee was perfect. Location of home was private. I will say Google Map took me past the house I had to turn around and go back luckily it was easy to spot since the photos were up to date.
I give this place a 10 out of 10, I do recommend and I will stay again.
Thank you Renee for having such a beautiful welcoming home.

The cabin is very nice and exactly as the listing shows. Renee was extremely nice in helping us whenever we had issues. Far above and beyond anyone else we’ve had previously. Would definitely stay again.
Our stay was so nice and the cottage was very welcoming and a great place to end the day after hiking around the area!
Amazing cabin for a getaway !
We had a lovely weekend and really enjoyed staying at this location!
The house was perfect for a restful evening after a full day. Furniture was comfy and kitchen well stocked. Renee is very responsive and friendly. I would stay here again if in the area.

This is my second time staying at this cozy cabin. It's immaculate, cozy, has a modern farmhouse design, and is well-appointed with everything you need in the kitchen, bath, and bedrooms (and I loved the little electric fireplace). Renee is a very attentive and responsive host, and the space is comfortable after a long day of hiking. It has charming details that add to guest comfort in so many ways!! I would definitely stay here again!
We loved this little place, will stay again when we come back in the summer

Renee and Tim are wonderful, friendly hosts, and have a beautiful place close to NRGNP. They provide all the little extras to make a stay easy and truly enjoyable! Beds are clean and comfortable after a day of hiking/rafting at the park. This is a terrific home base to enjoy the beauty of the area!

This cozy cottage was perfect for a mini weekend getaway. It had a very homey feeling and had everything you would need, It was close to New River National Park, and the hikes there were breathtaking. Renee responds promptly and provided clear instructions. 10/10 recommend!

This was a wonderful place to stay for our family vacation at New River Gorge National Park. The cottage is an easy drive to different points in the park, as well as to small towns with restaurants and shops, such as Beckley and Fayette, while still feeling like you are tucked away on a country road. The cottage was comfortable and peaceful and had just about everything we needed for our stay. I would highly recommend, and the host was very kind and available by phone/text.

A very peaceful setting, about a 20-minute drive from our rafting trip. Friendly host, cute and clean house. A pleasant place to start our mornings and end our evenings. We would certainly stay here again.
Renee’s home was the perfect place to stay during our trip to the area. Everything was clean and as advertised. Would love to stay here again when I’m in the area.
Renee was a fabulous host. She offered great restaurant recommendations and things to do. She was responsive in a timely manner and the home was gorgeous!

I couldn't have been happier. It was extremely peaceful, quiet, and a very nice place to relax at the end of a few long days in Beckley.
Renee was incredibly friendly and very responsive, and it was absolutely pristine inside.
I would gladly stay there again
Renee was super responsive & a great host. Thank you so much.

Renee's place was perfect for our family. It was exactly like described and on pictures. The cottage had everything we needed and had a lot of space for the 3 of us. We didn't cook, but had we have the need - everything was provided. It was SPOTLESS and this is single, most important thing for me when staying anywhere. We loved every minute of our stay! It is close to all the adventures of New River Gorge. We would definitely stay there again.

This a great location to explore NRGNP you are literally an easy drive to everything. If you are a light sleeper you may notice noise from the road. Renee is a super responsive host. Very comfortable space

Stayed for a girl's weekend, and to visit New River Gorge NP and Preserve. Renee's place is convenient because the park is large and has 4 visitor's centers, with this Airbnb located close to the middle of them.
The cottage is adorable, beds are comfortable, and it felt like a private respite.
Would recommend for 4 guests due to the fact that there is one bathroom, four kitchen chairs, and the extra bed is the pull-out couch in the living room. But it certainly could work for 6, as long as you are aware.
Renee was super responsive and a pleasure to deal with.
Would book Renee's cottage again if in the area!
Perfect little place for an anniversary weekend away, would definitely stay here again. Very clean!

We had a wonderful time at the airbnb! Very clean and quiet. Enjoyed having wine on the patio out back! Went white water rafting ,hiking,and coal mine expedition close by! Enjoyed our stay. Only thing i couldnt find was body soap for shower. i would highly recommend their airbnb!

We really enjoyed our stay at this airbnb. It is very clean and exactly how the pictures showed. They responded almost as soon as we messaged them while we were there. It is very peaceful and has everything u need for a fun little getaway. Would definitely book it again!

We booked Renee’s air bnb for a weekend getaway to New River Gorge National Park to celebrate ten years together! The home was clean and cozy, and stocked with anything you could need! We enjoyed the privacy it offered while still being close to everything near by, and loved having s’mores by the fire. Loved our stay!
thanks for being a great host.

It was our first time to stay in an Airbnb home and was not sure in the beginning, but when we entered Renee's cottage everything looked just like in the pictures. It looks like a simple cottage from the outside, but the inside is cozy and warm atmosphere. Everything is clean and the details are well thought. The only thing I suggest for future guests, if you have sensitive respiratory and allergic to perfumy cleaning spray, you might want to make arrangements for alternative with Renee, she is very accommodative. I understand somehow preventing bugs coming in. As overall, I rated this place as A+.
We had a wonderful stay and having the cottage as a home base was just right!! We will definitely stay there again if we visit West Virginia again!!

Absolutely beautiful place to stay in the West Virginia hills. I love the privacy that this space provided while also being close to activities. Renee is as sweet as sugar, very responsive and friendly. I would highly recommend staying here.

This was the perfect little place to return "home" to each day with a great location for exploring multiple areas in the national park and the Beckley area. We really enjoyed using the firepit to cook hot dogs and s'mores!
Beautiful location, the place was cozy. We had an amazing stay.

This place is incredible, and the location is very impressive. It was clean, accessible, and very beautiful. Renee was very helpful from the beginning of our trip to the very end. We recommend this place to those who want a good experience in Geroge River National Park. Also, it's close to Babcock State Park and Hawks Nest. We are very thankful for this visit and would certainly come back again.

The inside was bigger than expected and nicely decorated. There are blinds on all windows and nice dishes and cups to use. Only 20 mins to Fayetteville where we ate at majority of the trip. The owner was quick to respond and was proactive when needed. The cabin was close to everything we wanted to do (New River Gorge National Park, Hawks Nest State Park, Babcock State Park, Cathedral Falls, and Ace for white water rafting).

We loved the place good location . Clean home within driving distance to all the area attractions . The host was very helpful and gave great recommendations . Did not get to do everything the area has to offer, so we will definitely be back

This cozy cottage was the perfect place! Renee was so accommodating! She was indeed the hostess with the mostess! everything was better than we could have ever imagined. and it was so much bigger than we expected!! we hope to be back in the future!

This place is exactly like the photos! It was a comfy cottage in the woods. My husband and I enjoyed our stay so much. We especially enjoyed grilling out and making fires. I highly recommend this cozy cottage for your stay!
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Incredible stay! I cannot wait to go back
This was a cute, cozy, comfortable and very private home and an ideal location for taking in the sights and amenities of the New River Gorge National Park. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

A perfect cozy place for our trip to the new river gorge national park! The host was very accommodating and left us with everything we needed for a successful trip. Good distance from local attractions.
The cabin was very clean. Renee and her husband were super helpful with anything we needed. Would definitely recommend staying here.
What a great little cabin! Exactly as advertised, impeccably clean and well stocked. Tons of extra towels and blankets, nice dishes, and a perfect private location.
This cabin is extremely accurate to the pictures! Everything was clean and it was an easy drive to all the nearby attractions. Highly recommend booking this Airbnb!

Location was close to the New River Gorge Bridge and within driving distance of other area attractions and hiking trails. The home was very well kept and had everything we needed for our stay. Would definitely stay here again in the future!

This cozy cottage was great. It had everything that we needed to cook meals including a grill. It was really clean and smelled good also. The location is good. This cottage was a great place to crash after a long day of mountain biking and hiking. If we are ever back in the area, I would stay here again!

Great location, just a 20 minute drive from ace adventure resort where we went whitewater rafting, 20 minutes from some great hikes in New River George NP, cozy and peaceful atmosphere and plenty of space for a small group of people.
Great stay! Cute and cozy, clean and comfortable. Would love to come back!
Super awesome cottage, close to everything to explore in the NRG area. The space is very comfortable, quiet and clean.

Great place to stay and close to a lot of local attractions. We really liked how it was rural, but not too far out of town. It is just a short drive away from great hiking trails and great food. The place was very clean and cozy.

The home was so clean and comfortable. Renee was very hospitable. The location is centralized to lots of activities but you feel like you’re in the woods. We had a great time and will definitely be back.
Such a charming, cozy cottage!! Everything you need is there and a great location!! Hosts were super accomodating and quick to respond!! We will be back for sure!!
What a great space to stay! Very cozy as advertised. My wife and I enjoyed the space and cooked here every night in lieu of heading out!

Beautiful cabin and very clean. We had everything we needed. It’s in a great location and middle point to all of the beautiful sights of the New River Gorge.
Renee was great. The coffee pot broke and she was there within a half hour with a new one. Checking in and out was a breeze.
Thank you again for everything!
Beautiful house and yard

What an adorable house! We stayed in the summer and it was great but I’d love to come back in the winter and cozy up to the wood stove with a book! Renee was amazing. Communication was quick and she was willing to go above and beyond to make our stay perfect. The house was immaculate and just so cute! We didn’t get to enjoy the fire pit due to rain but I did sit on the front porch one night and it was so quiet and peaceful. We would definitely return.

This is a top notch home.
We very much enjoyed our stay at Renee and Tim’s bnb.
From the personalized hand written greeting to the excellent communication and cozy feel, it was definitely a memorable stay.
We will be staying here for every visit to the area.
They’ve created wonderful kitchen to cook in or you can grill out back on the patio.
They have some seating out back as well for some relaxing after a long day of activity.
Try it, you won’t be dissatisfied.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Everything we needed was right there. It is truly a cabin that is cozy, clean, and pleasant. Renee was quite prompt and engaged in all communications. We also discovered that the location is fairly central to various points in the New River Gorge park.
After a busy day we enjoyed the quiet outdoors in front and back of the cabin. Deer did too as they came grazing by. Thanks for a relaxing stay!

Charming and cozy getaway! This was our second time visiting the area. My wife and I are coming up on our first anniversary and this was our first trip together with her parents (who haven’t been on a vacation in a while, along with it also being Father’s Day weekend). So it was important to have all the things about our trip leave a great impression.
This cozy cottage did exactly that and more for the entire three nights we stayed. To start, my in-laws were overjoyed the second we walked in; This was their first bnb stay, as they are used to staying in hotels. In addition, my wife and mother-in-law were blown away with the attention to detail the host Renee put into all the decor to make the cottage feel like a true home - from the wall frames, to the decorative pillows, signs, flower arrangements, comforters, etc. It was so charming! We all were impressed by the outdoor space with plenty of room for everyone to hang. We loved spending our last night grilling out, dining outdoors, and sitting by the fire pit until the sun went down. The hosts already had dried wood ready for our use along with a wheelbarrow full of extra logs to use if needed and the lighter. The kitchen was stocked with all the typical necessities of a normal kitchen at home, which we loved since we cooked half of our meals there. I am a huge fan of coffee and was excited the host Renee had a nice setup with ground coffee and the maker. The whole cottage was the perfect size. Not too big and not too small. The living room and kitchen were very spacious. Wi-Fi was fast working, which was perfect for watching shows on streaming services if needed. The bathroom was great! My wife and mother-in-law loved the heater option to turn on because they are cold natured lol. The bedrooms were beautiful and a nice setup. The mattresses were soft (which we aren’t used to at most bnbs) and perfect to sleep on after a long day of hiking, rafting, and zip lining. Every room was exceptionally clean as well.
Renee was such a wonderful and intentional host! Before we even got there, she made sure to contact us to keep us updated about storms in the area; She checked in on us after we were settled in; and was very quick to respond to any messages or questions we had during the stay. She and her cottage were the perfect home away from home to make for a great family trip! Five stars and more for this stay! The New River Gorge never seems to disappoint and it’s a comfortable, relaxing, and feeling of home like this place that tie it all together- where you start the day, make more memories, laugh, relive adventures, and end the day peacefully. Definitely would stay here again if we come visit the area for a third time!

We had a great 3 night stay. Nice quiet area. Spacious inside. My 14 year old schnauzer LOVED the big fenced in yard and would have spent all day out there if we let her. Dollar General at the end of the road is super convenient for anything you need/forgot.
It was a great place to stop on the way home from Myrtle Beach. The home was clean and comfortable. We would stay there again.
Stopped on the way to obx had a great experience
Will stay again if in the area!
This was our second time staying here and we loved it! Definitely coming back again!
An amazing place to stay. Very clean and in a nice neighborhood.
The yard was bigger than I expected, my fur baby loved it! Home was very comfortable, clean, and cozy. Forrest was kind, responsive, and cared that our stay was comfortable. Thank you Forrest!

We loved Forrest’s house! We needed a place to stay as a halfway point during our long road-trip from Canada and this was perfect. The house was super clean and had everything we needed. The large fenced in yard is an added bonus for those traveling with pets. Way better than a hotel! 10/10 recommend.

Forrest’s place was a great stopping point with our dog as we were driving from NC to Montana. Great communication, really nice, clean house and big fenced-in yard for a dog are just a few of the great things about this location. We’d definitely stay here again!

Forrest’s place was a great place for our family over Easter weekend. My daughter accidentally left a stuffed animal at the house and Forrest was kind enough to let us know and even dropped it off locally to a relative for us. I would definitely recommend staying here.
Forrest was great and very understanding. He was the light during a rough situation and we greatly appreciate his accommodations!
The house is perfect and Forest is a great host. Very communicative and fast responding. He was very prompt at answering any questions we had.
Great place, very clean, and had everything we could have needed. Host was very friendly and responsive. Highly recommend!
Great stay! Wonderful beds! will stay again!

Forrest’s place is updated and clean and very convenient to the interstate. We stayed one night on our travels north.
His communication was great and his place is as described. Check in was easy.
We brought our dog, but unfortunately didn't stay long enough to take advantage of the fenced in yard.
Forest and his wife were absolutely amazing. In fact, Albert Tab by the house it’s beautiful
I really enjoyed this place!👌 it was very nice and the beds were amazing! And the view is amazing!
Great spot! The view was beautiful and the fenced in yard was perfect for a dog. The kitchen was well stocked with cooking supplies (pots, pans, etc) which was handy too.
Very nice place was great for our family vacation to New River Gorge

We used this place as a jumping point for exploring red river gorge - it was a great option. We loved the yard to let our kids run around outside and used the campfire. It is small town West Virginia - so if you're hoping for a luxury feel in the neighborhood, you're looking in the wrong place. We loved the space and views and the quiet of having our own house vs a hotel.
Good experience and friendly host.

I reached out the the host a few times and she responded right away. She welcomed feedback and was extremely kind and understanding.
The pictures matched the description and we loved the fenced in area for our dog, the large kitchen, the soft beds, and the lovely outdoor seating areas.
Everyone in WV was so nice. We visited the national park and three state parks. Gorgeous area with a rich history.
Thank you for letting us stay at your well appointment home!
Beautiful views, great yard for dog, and friendly and communicative hosts!

wow what a view! I really enjoyed staying at the Stonewall Cottage. The home and back yard are spacious. The beds are soft and comfortable and the views are epic. perfect for adventurers and cozy seekers alike! We visited in Feb and it snowed! Even though it was cold the showers were hot and the heaters kept us all warm. As new puppy owners, we appreciated the pet friendly atmosphere. I truely felt at hone and I can't wait to visit again!

Great little cottage with a gorgeous view of the gorge. My husband and I stayed here with our dog while we went skiing at Winterplace and explored NRG NP. There is a small binder full of recommendations to local places that we fully took advantage of! The cottage was perfect for our needs and the large fenced in back yard was a great addition. After a long day, our Great Pyrenees just relaxed out in the back yard. There are places in the bottom of the fence that a small dog could easily escape, so be mindful of that. Also be mindful that this is a three bedroom home that can sleep 6 but only has one bathroom. We were slightly concerned driving in with our FWD crossover but were thankful that it’s paved roads all the way to the cottage and the roads were well taken care of in the winter without concerns for ice. Would definitely recommend!
We enjoyed our stay. Nice home and beautiful views of the WV mountains!!
We had a great stay while visiting our family for the holidays. Perfect for families with kids and dogs. We really loved the huge fenced yard! The view was spectacular. Hope to return in the summer!

I stayed with my husband and dog. The home was comfortable (a home away from home), and our dog loved the yard. The views were beautiful, and the location was quiet. It's a nice getaway. We also did some hiking at New River Gorge National Park. It was a good location to check out the park.
Great place. Beautiful view.
the place was perfect for our stay in New river gorge

What an absolutely perfect place to stay! Close to the new National park, great hiking, beautiful views! Blaine & Justin thought of it all! Cute and cozy home! Enjoyed the weekend hiking & white water rafting while sitting by the fire after a long day of adventure! Would love to come back again!
Great place to stay. Wonderful access to the whole park and you cannot beat the view from the backyard. The dogs and kids loved it.
Beautiful views, our dogs absolutely loved the fenced in yard.
Great stay!
We thoroughly enjoyed staying here! It was very clean and the view was beautiful. We loved being able to bring our dogs and Blaine was always very responsive!

The cottage was a great home base for our adventures in the New River Gorge National Park. Clean, well-equipped and spacious, we had everything we (including dogs) needed. A fantastic view off the back deck was icing on the cake. Blaine is a fantastic hostess!

Lovely, quiet place off the beaten path but close to the national park and activities. Wonderful, large fenced in yard. We had a dog. Nice deck with a view to eat outside. Fire pit was a great way to unwind after a day of activities. Great amenities. Hosts responsive to questions. Ping pong table in the shed a fun touch! We were only 4 but could sleep six comfortably. I’m a fan of fall and leaf peeping and this place will be brimming with color in a few weeks!

We enjoyed our stay here! It is incredibly dog friendly and had everything we needed to be comfortable. The view was beautiful. We spent most of our time out exploring, but this was a great place to crash in the evenings!

We absolutely enjoyed our stay here. Stunning views from the deck/back yard. The yard was nice size for our dogs to play in. The house felt very warm and welcoming, we felt right at home. There is so much to do in that area. We spent much of our time exploring the New River Gorge National Park. We really enjoyed the town Fayetteville WV. It is very pedestrian friendly with a few local brewery's and shops. We would 100% stay here again.
Great stay! beautiful views. Very clean and peaceful. nlNeighbors were friendly. I'd stay again and I do recommend!
We loved the cottage. It was perfect for our stay. We love that it is dog friendly and has a fenced in yard. The location is perfect for enjoying the New River Gorge park.

The house was perfect for our family. Kitchen was stocked well for our needs. Downtown Beckley was very close for grocery shopping. The view was amazing. Unfortunately we were not able to use the firepit or the ping pong table. We stayed for just the week-end and it was very humid and there were some storms that came through in the evening. Location is very close to all the National Park has to offer. We walked some trails and did rafting and ziplining at Adventures on the Gorge. The house was well stocked with info on the trails and things to do in the area. Overall the house was very cute, welcoming and tastefully decorated. We would love to come back to the area for a longer period of time and would definitely stay again. Blaine was great with communication.

The view was so gorgeous, and I loved having a big fenced-in yard for my dog to run around it. Also one of the best stocked kitchens I have ever seen at an Airbnb. The house was closer to neighbors than I expected, but it was a fairly quiet neighborhood. Overall a clean and peaceful experience! Would definitely stay again if I come back to New River Gorge.
Beautiful location neat New River Gorge National Park. The house was very inviting, clean and comfy. We appreciated clear and proactive communication from our hosts!

If I could describe this place in one word, it would be COMFORTABLE.
The beds are great and the bedrooms themselves are spacious. The kitchen is wide open, you are not knocking into each other when cooking. The couches recline on the one side. The bathroom is a good size and does not feel like a sauna when you exit the shower because the fan does its job and there is also a window in there. The outdoor areas are just phenomenal. You'll always find somewhere to sit, the view is amazing. Huge fan of the Hammock! You don't really even notice the neighbors because it's super quiet and peaceful. If I ever decide to explore the New River Gorge again, I'll be staying here, where it's "Almost Heaven" as the West Virginia folks say. 🥰 Thanks for the experience!

Blaine and Justin’s place is a great place if you’re in the area. Beautiful view, peaceful and close to New River Valley Gorge trails. It was clean, and it was helpful how responsive and helpful they were. I would recommend and happily stay again if I’m back in the area.

Extremely comfortable stay. Clean, with everything you need. Beds are extremely comfy. AC was magical after being out in the heat. The view out back is lovely. To say there is a lot to do at the New River Gorge & surrounding areas is an understatement. Found a gorgeous drive up place to swim near the campground at Glades Creek which is pretty close to the house (FYI) for anyone looking for a place to swim near by. Babcock State Park was lovely too with a water too to cool off.

We very much enjoyed our stay at Blaine’s place! It was a peaceful retreat after our hiking in the Gorge. We had a 2 year old with us who loved running around the yard & using the play set. The beds were unbelievably comfortable! Will definitely stay again if back in this area.

Beautiful view at the top of a mountain. Very nice deck and under porch swing for enjoying coffee or an evening drink with a view. Nestled within a neighborhood so not a lot of “privacy”. About 15-30 minutes away from grocery store or upscale dining. It was a great stay to enjoy our honeymoon together.
Great place. Beautiful mountain view and great location near state parks and New River Gorge.

We loved staying here! The home was adorable, comfortable, had everything we needed (and more!) and had a beautiful view. Blaine’s communication was thorough and check in was a piece of cake. We loved being so close to rafting, hiking, etc. There was a lot to do in the area! Plus we tried a couple local restaurants that didn’t disappoint. If you’re looking for a place close to New River Gorge National Park, don’t pass this one by!!

Gorgeous views and the coziest home. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The beds were very comfortable, everyone slept great. The yard was perfect entertainment for our whole family. Great location for exploring the new river gorge. Would definitely stay again!

Blain was very responsive and attentive to us during our stay. The house accommodated 5 people comfortably,
Especially with one large bathroom. All the necessities were available. I don’t know the costs of other Airbnbs in the area, but I feel like this place was more affordable than AirBnbs closer into Fayetteville. We were able to drive to hiking/biking/walking trails within 30 minutes from the house each day. I had never traveled to the area before, but really enjoyed my weekend there and cannot wait to get back!

This home was clean and roomy. We had plenty of room for my family and parents while we were in town for the weekend celebrating a friends college graduation. The home was beautifully updated and tucked away in the mountains. The directions to the home were great and the lock to the home was the easiest of any Air bnb I have ever stayed! (Thank you!) Clean linens were provided and plenty of kitchen items if you wished to cook. The home allows pets, but did not smell at all like animals had been there. The home was not far from town and we were able to take a break from graduation festivities to grab a little siesta before heading out for the evening. A nap on the hammock was my absolute favorite!! The VIEW!! This was definitely a lovely home and perfect get away for the weekend! We would definitely stay again!
We had a relaxing getaway in Blaine & Justin’s house. Amazing view of foggy mountains from the deck and backyard!Clean and cozy place with everything we needed for a weekend.
cute little place to spend the weekend with my husbands mom and 2 sisters in law. we had a great time. the house was perfect and the view from the back deck was beautiful.

What a beautiful location! the house was perfect for a 4 day spring break getaway with friends and dogs. the fenced in yard is huge and the house fit us perfectly. equidistant from both the northern and southern ends of the gorge. don't hesitate to stay here!

What a wonderful retreat adjacent to New River Gorge! My family of 5 (3 kids: 12, 10, 8) + 1 dog really enjoyed this home. The listing was very accurate and the surroundings were more beautiful than imagined. My kids enjoyed the cozy furniture and ping pong table. My dog enjoyed the yard and my wife and I enjoyed all the wonderful amenities of home plus the view!
The location is excellent: tucked away in a small neighborhood, next to a cliff side and overlooking one of the tributaries into the Gorge. It’s about 30 minutes to all 3 NRG visitor centers and 15 minutes to Beckley and restaurants.
The hosts were very responsive and great at communicating. The house was incredibly clean and had all of the amenities we wanted. This was a wonderful getaway into the NRG, which is exactly what I was looking for. My family made a lot of great memories and we want to return!
Note this is in a neighborhood with kids so please drive slowly and carefully on the narrow roads.

wonderful house that was spotless and welcoming. the house has plenty of beds to sleep 6. the house is big enough for everyone but still feels very welcoming. the area is about 10-15 mins from Beckley. the area is very quiet. it was too cold be outside but the view of the stars at night was beautiful.
the house was a great location to visit multiple areas of NRG. the hosts were quick to answer any questions and helpful before we even arrived. great opportunity to rent and bring your pets (we did not on this trip). the house was clean and smelled great. couches extremely comfortable and kitchen well stocked. we look forward to returning in the future.

This felt just like home and was exactly what we needed. This was a very special weekend for us and we very much so look forward for anniversaries being shared here but also making it a family affair. Gorgeous view and game room! All in all this is a great place and we had a blast!
Very relaxing getaway! Beautiful views of the mountains, and excellent view of the stars in the evening! This rental had everything that we needed to make our trip enjoyable!
Beautiful views! the house was nice, had everything we needed. our dog loved fenced-in yard.
We loved our stay from the amazing view to the comfortable beds. we felt right at home. We will definitely book this location again😊

We had a fabulous stay and lacked for nothing! Comfortable beds, stocked kitchen, and a beautiful view! The dogs loved the yard and were very safe with the fence. We spent a whole day exploring New River Gorge and loved every minute! Thank you so much for a great stay!!
Great place to stay! Felt like we were right at home. Blaine was very responsive and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.

Loved that I actually found a place that accepted dogs and had a large fenced in yard. The yard was our favorite part! The beds and couches were comfy. Really appreciated the restaurant recommendations as well!
Awesome and quiet place to stay while skiing at Winterplace. Definitely would come back!
Justin & Blaine were excellent hosts. Great view from the deck. Would visit again.

Blaine was amazing to work with. We were meeting our son, his wife and baby in Beckley, half way for both of us for Christmas. As it happened it was in the middle of the frigid storm with ice. Blaine reached out to make sure we knew that our safety was her biggest concern and even if we couldn't come she wanted us safe. She kept in touch as we figured out the weather. As it happened we did go and brought enough food for the whole stay. When we arrived she had a sweet little Christmas tree. We cooked every meal and sat 5 adults and one baby at the table for every meal. We definitely were able to enjoy being together for the holiday. Though we didn't get to spend time outside, we still had a great time. With the Roku we were able to get all our subscriptions and had football, games and food. The kitchen was large enough and roomy enough to accommodate cooking all the meals. The bedrooms are simple and comfortable. Master bedroom was very warm. Would stay again - great host!

Blaine was a thoughtful and kind host, even calling ahead of bad weather to explain the road conditions and offer flexibility and even a refund if we determined the roads were not safe to travel. We ended up making the trip and are so glad we did. The kitchen had everything we needed and the extra touches (Christmas tree and blankets, games) made us feel very welcome and at home. We happened to stay during inclement weather so could not enjoy the view as much as we'd hoped and the house was a bit farther off the main road than expected, which proved a little challenging after the snow, but that could not be helped. We really enjoyed hiking around New River Gorge and the proximity to trails (and local personally curated guidebooks) were probably the features we appreciated the most. Wish we could have stayed longer!
Amazing view! 100% would rent again!
Really enjoyed staying here. Felt like home and was very spacious. Would definitely stay here again!

We highly recommend staying at Blaine’s place! Traveling with dogs is often difficult and costly, but necessary since we have a special-needs dog. However, that wasn’t the case this time! The space was spotless, spacious, and met every need. The yard and views were the best part for our group. Many recommendations were provided and Blaine ensured we had everything we needed. When visiting family again, we will certainly stay here going forward!

This place has it all - great homebase location for exploring throughout the park; breathtaking views; amenities including fenced-in yard and ping pong table; and available, communicative hosts. Would recommend and re-book.
Great place to stay and explore New River Gorge National Park! Views were phenomenal and Blaine was very helpful and quick with responding to our questions!

We had the perfect weekend get-away at Blaine’s house!!! Blaine truly thought of everything from the welcome board in the kitchen to prepping the fire pit. The kitchen was stocked with everything from pots/pans/dishes to s’mores skewers & plastic baggies. Such a comfy house & tastefully decorated with all the information we needed to fully enjoy everything the area has to offer. The truly special part of this property, however, is the yard & the view. We brought our dog, Penny, and she was so happy!!! When I asked my kids what their favorite part of the weekend was, they said the evening we hung out at the house, making s’mores & playing ping pong. Thank you for helping us to make wonderful family memories!

Thank you, Blaine & Justin! Our stay was amazing!!! Very clean & cozy cabin and easy to get to on a dead end so no traffic. From the attention to detail to having everything we needed, was beyond our expectations. The mountain view in the back was so incredibly awesome!! It was the best sleep ever after venturing out and enjoying either a hike in New River Gorge NP, exploring historical sites such as the Beckley Exhibition Coal Mine, or enjoying a play in the cute and fun town of Lewisburg.
Blaine & Justin were gracious & polite hosts making sure that all of our needs were satisfied. Would definitely recommend to someone who is looking for a nice getaway. You won't be disappointed!
Great stay! wonderful view and hosts were helpful!
Thank you!!
The house was spotless and beautiful! The view of the gorge was exactly what i needed. Would absolutely stay here again.

We thoroughly enjoyed this property! Peaceful, spacious and clean, with all the amenities we needed and then some fun extras! Blaine is a fantastic host; great communication and instructions! We enjoyed the view off the back deck, and the bed was so comfortable! Great location for exploring New River Gorge. We will definitely book this property again!
Great stay! Blaine was a great host.

The house and area is beautiful. It’s very quiet, very clean, and the neighbors are a delight. Blaine is incredibly generous and very communicative. If we’re in this area again I would love to be in this same spot! 10/10
Great place for a “home base” while exploring New River Gorge National Park. Clean, great communication, well stocked from the kitchen to the bathroom! Definitely recommend!

The place was spectacular for our trip to the New River Gorge. Bpain madehimself readily available whenever we needed it without being intrusive. We'll definitely be back next time we're in the gorge.

Great place - had everything one could want.. very clean. Awesome view of the mountain top from the back deck and my puppies and I loved the large fenced in yard. Excellent location for enjoying all new river gorge national park has to offer. I would definitely stay here again.
The house was very nice and the location was convenient. Blaine was super responsive the whole trip.
Very homey, the house was very well stocked and clean. The view was beautiful! Host was responsive, attentive, and very flexible. Thank you again for the stay!
Great location, very peaceful and walkable land. Jill and her husband were very friendly and nearby if anything was needed.

Jill & Cliff were amazing hosts! The location was beautiful and the fishing tournament was an unexpected, but pleasant surprise! The loft itself was clean and cozy. Jill even gave us a tour of the property and let us roam on our own. Would 100% stay again! Thanks Jill & Cliff for everything!
Beautiful, peaceful area, tucked back in the holler! Jill and Cliff were very accommodating to every need! We will definitely be back!
Beautiful newly constructed loft on a gorgeous piece of private property. Very nicely decorated and cozy. A perfect place to stop for a night or a week. We will definitely be back!
We were very happy to have a beautiful location to stop at after a long drive. Our hosts were friendly and helpful. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and plan on going back.

Fully equipped apartment above the garage. Quiet. Great for exploring New River Gorge. Smart tv w/ all streaming services. Coffee and creamer provided for drip machine. A/c added just prior to our arrival. Recommend.
Pleasant stay for our visit to New River Gorge National Park
Place was cozy, quiet quiet and clean. Was exactly what I was wanting.

We were in town for a wedding held at the Athena Estate & Vineyard. This gem is only an 8 minute drive to the venue. It also near the Piney Creek Reserve which has two lovely Waterwalls to view and a trailhead to hike.
We enjoyed walking the hilly neighborhood to view the fall foliage. We would have relaxed on the deck in the mornings to drink our coffee if hadn't been such a soggy weekend.
The large kitchen was well equipped with spices, coffee, and tea. The refrigerator was stocked with bottled water (a nice touch). The living room was cheerful and inviting. TV had roku for streaming; internet/wi-fi provided. The bed, linens, and towels were comfy. We enjoyed our quiet stay here , and if in we need overnight acomadations in the Beckley area in the future, would stay here again.
Thank you for sharing your lovely apartment.

This was a spacious Airbnb with everything we needed. It was like having a one bedroom apartment to ourselves with easy parking and laundry. It was about 30 min to drive from here to new river gorge.
Sue and her family were responsive when we had questions. Thanks for hosting us!
Cute, cozy and spacious apartment. Very clean. Good communication with host.
Quite close to the National Park, very clean and cozy. We enjoyed our stay here!

Sue was a wonderful host. She communicated with us before the visit and checked on us to make sure everything was okay once we got there. As this was part of a special occasion, she had an added surprise for us which was so thoughtful. We would definitely stay here again if we find ourselves in the area.
It was a great home away from home.
Sue was very friendly. Her place was very clean and close to everywhere that we needed to be during out stay.
Quiet and peaceful. I work nights and sleeping during the day was easy.
The place was cute and we liked staying here. Host was very friendly and communicative. Would definitely come back!
I work nightsa and sleep during day. Very quiet. definitely would go back.

Great place to stay for our weekend trip home. The apartment was very warm and welcoming with a southern WV feel. The location was convenient, but also quiet and relaxing. The furniture was comfortable and up-to-date. We will definitely consider this cute spot on our next trip home to visit with family.

Quaint little apartment—we had plenty of room and felt comfortable. We didn’t want for a single thing: plenty of pillows and towels and paper towels. If ever visiting Beckley again, I would want to stay here.
Nice place to stay. Roomy and all the amenities. Sue was great.
Sue’s place is conveniently located, check-in was effortless. Her communication was excellent. Sue’s place was just as described, very neat and comfortable.
The apartment above the garage was clean and comfortable. Sue was helpful with local information. The location is a bit off the beaten path but very quiet. we enjoyed our stay.
Very clean & felt very welcomed ❤️
Great place to stay! Quiet, close to town, excellent bed, shower, kitchen & perfect space for 1-2. Hosts communicated great & even offered storage for my bicycle. Super clean & comfy. Will be back!

Kailyn's Place is private, spacious and bright, and better than the pictures, in my opinion. It's has everything I needed for my almost two weeks' stay, and a great home base for visiting New River Gorge NP. Sue and Jimmy are attentive hosts and I enjoyed meeting them.
Perfect little spot and is just as described! Private, spacious and had everything that I needed. Sue was very nice and welcoming and would definitely stay there again!
Clean, cozy, near all the hikes we wanted to go!

We enjoyed our stay at Sue’s place. The unit itself is adorable and has everything you could possibly need. Sue greeted us upon arrival even though the weather was freezing. Such a nice warm welcome. We were in the area to explore New River Gorge National Park and Sue’s place was convenient to portions of the park. There’s plenty of privacy in the quiet neighborhood.
